Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I'm a headphone junky, and I got these because the price was right, the color is nice and vibrant, and I can wear them at work. They have a very long cord, so I do have to bundle it up and put a twisty tie around the bundle, but this is no big deal, rather too much cord than not enough. The sound is nice, not super great such as some of the more expensive headphones, but then again I mostly use these to listen to audio books, so the sound is just right, and they do have decent bass. If you are looking for a lightweight, nice but cost effective pair of headphones I would definitely recommend these. They do fold up nicely, too.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
My son loves to watch movies/listen to music/play games on his tablet or one of our phones while we are travelling. The problem is, my husband and I are listening to our own music through the car speakers. So, we purchased these headphones for him so all of us could be happy travelers.

He LOVES these headphones! They are soft, padded and extremely comfortable to wear…even for longer road trips. The noise cancelling/isolating feature on these really do help tune out the outside noise around him. The fact that they can fold up and not be space hog in his travel bag is also a nice feature. It would be nice if these headphones came with a little storage bag to keep them in when not in use. The cord is covered in a very durable fabric cover which feels like it is going to stand up well to the abuse of being moved around from the house to the car, etc.

We tried the microphone out during a recent cellphone call. I could hear the person talking crystal clear…so much better than when I listen directly through my cellphone itself. Again, that is where the noise cancelling/isolating feature comes in great. I was told that I came in very clear on the receiving end, but that they could hear more external noise (probably because it has a 360° microphone) as it seemed to be very good at picking up all sounds.

I purchased this Ailihen stereo foldable headphones at a discounted price for my honest review and I am thankful that there are no more “who wants to listen to what” discussions as we are in the car travelling. For under $30 (not $20 like mentioned in the video), you are getting a quality headphone that I would say sounds and feels much better than some of the pricier ones out there.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Great headphones. Comfortable with good sound quality. I love the color! I have a small head, so these fit perfectly, especially because they are easily adjustable. The wire only hangs from one ear bud, so you're not annoyed by it as your're working.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I absolutely love the company, INTONE, that sells these headphones. Originally, I had purchased these headphones May 31, 2016, and they proved to be defective after a month of use, as one of the headphones had detached from the handle. I contacted INTONE and attached a picture of my headphones, and the company agreed to send another pair to me. The representative told me I would receive the headphones by July 27, 2016 but I actually received them July 21, 2016!! The service INTONE provides is 5-stars!

Now, when regarding the headphones I absolutely love them, even though I received a defective pair the first go-round-- you can experience a defect with any product and/or any manufacturer/designer. The bass on these headphones is excellent and the surround sound is awesome. There is a small operating panel for the cell phone and volume on the cord-- very convenient for working out and cooking (I personally find them handy for these activities). I use these headphones for both my computer and cell phone. A great buy for the price! #AMUSTHAVE

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
The only thing I have to say bad about the product is that the color of the headphones does not quite match what was pictured. They came in a darker purple, but oh well!

I use these for transcribing and I love how it helps to block out surrounding noise. Sometimes it is really hard to hear the speaker, and being able to focus on just the speaker and not the noises of everyday life is really nice.

The sound is as clear as the audio in which is was recorded on. I used another expensive brand and these are very comparable to them.

I love the cord. It is reinforced so it will not end up fraying as easily as a typical plastic coated one would. It is sturdy enough to stand up to my cats, who seem to think that the nice long cord is for them to play with.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Amazing for the price, the bass its pretty good, received them today and they are good so far, hope the headphones last a long time and ive been using them for a while and my ears doesnt hurt, ive seen a couple of bad reviews that one of the cushions fell apart, put some super glue and fix it and other thing its some doesnt take care of the headphones properly thats why they dont last for a long time.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Originally I had loved these, one because of the cord that didn't tangle whatsoever (Love that part) and I loved the color and that they folded up for easy storage and whatnot. But now, I have had them for at least a month or two and as much as I wish I could love these and give five stars I simply can't because they kill my ears. This set is putting way too much pressure or something on my ears and I have to move them constantly to not be in pain which really sucks.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
When it comes to headphones I always seem to have the worst luck. My headphones either break from in an extremely weird way, somehow hurt my ears, lose sound on one side or end up disappearing completely. When I saw these I was taken in by the color and specs listed. I decided to take a chance on these headphones, a chance that is definitely paying off.

They play music wonderfully. Alongside blocking outside sounds.The padding on the headphones is super soft and doesn't make your head sore from extended use. Even better is the fact the colors pictures are 100% accurate. A rarity for Amazon pictures. I'm used to some color variation or some vague disappointment. To have this surprise me in a good way was great. I'd highly recommend this headphones to more casual folks who want some sound blocking and cuteness.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These are by far, the best kids headphones for the cost. I went through many other brands and styles before finding these.
1) They are really sturdy and durable. The nylon wrapped cord doesn't kink. There is an extended coated wire from the ear cup to the headband that allows for movement and forgives a little kids not so easy handling.

2) Seriously. You can't beat the price. These headphones are worth more for everything going they provide.

3) The ear cup is so soft and stretchy, you can wear them for long periods without pinching. They also cancel out outside sounds really well.

4) The volume is definitely fine for kids, and adults alike. Yes, you can find headphones that allow you to get sick base and blah, blah, blah.... These aren't made for that. You will, however, be able to watch movies and videos with clear and perfect pitches, highs, lows and stereo.

5) The framework is definitely sturdy and will withstand long use. Nothing about it feels chensy or cheap.

6) The mic works great. It picks up voice and delivers yours clearly and without static.

All in all, I love these. This is our second pair. We had the first for over a year with our 6-7 year old exclusively using great them. That should be an excellent recommendation in and of itself! They only broke when I accidentally caught the cord in the car door and walked away, causing the cord to separate from the mic area.

Give them a try, you won't be sorry!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These stay secure. I use them to run and for strength training. I have had no issues while working out with these. They work better than the in ear buds and do not slip off while doing hit training. 4 stars because the sound sometimes feels muffled.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Update: Ailihen was really kind enough to replace the headphones and sent me a new pair! I am really happy with there service because they were really simple and only requested for your order ID and a picture! I am definitely adding another star for this!

Old Review:
Okay, Let me make one thing clear. This is really a top notch pair of headphones. It has amazing sound quality and will make you feel like you are in a music video sometimes. But, the durability is really not that high quality. After like about 1 and a half months of using, The Right ear-phone (The one without the wire.) Fell of for no reason. I may be at fault but I was really careful with it. It turns out the Folding had weakened the earphone's holder and it just randomly fell off. The Sound quality is still all good but it is just clumsy. Overall, you get what you pay for. If you are looking for cheap headphones that will probably last you a month with the same sound quality as Bose,Sony etc. I recommend this. And I hope that Ailihen can replace the one that just broke.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphones are very comfortable, produce decent sound, have a reasonably long, braided cable and include a microphone and button for playback and phone control. And they're decently priced normally and were even a better deal on Prime Day. What more could you ask for?

I picked them up for my wife to listen to audio books while working, as the inexpensive headphones she had been using (which, incidentally, cost about the same as these but are far cheaper quality) were uncomfortable for her to wear for extended periods. After putting these on she immediately loved how comfortable they felt. The ear pads are surprisingly soft, considering how firm some of the less expensive leatherette headphones can be.

The cable isn't as solid as many of the reinforced, double nylon braided phone charging cables that you can buy now, but it's still nice feeling and easy to manage, and feels durable enough that you should be able to safely rely on it not easily getting pinched or weakening due to use. The included microphone and playback/call control button are a nice, unexpected feature. The button does feel slightly on the cheap side, and I wouldn't have complained if it included volume controls as well, but it still works well and is a nice bonus.

Of course, an audiophile would say that there are far better headphones, and I own a fair few of them. But for the price and value, you can't go wrong with these.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I bought these for my son because I really don't want to listen to his YouTube or video game music. They work so well he no longer listens to me because he says, "the headphones, Mom. They don't let me hear what you say, only MY stuff."

Having a son who ignores me is a very small price to pay for an hour of coffee-drinking peace.

These do go pretty loud, so I've set noise-safety rules--I check to see that they are low enough from time to time so they won't damage his ears.

These fold up nicely, are durable, and the cord is wrapped with a woven material so it stays secure in the headphone, doesn't break, and survived one dog attack. They make my son think he's got a popular teen-brand approved headphone, but I didn't pay nearly that much in the end. These are nice.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Pros - The sound quality is pretty fantastic for the price. The headset fits well, and the cord is longer than normal and covered in nylon. Having an extra foot of cable is wonderful, and the nylon just seems to be easier to work with and keep from getting tangled.

Cons - A few runs in the heat and and afternoon in my truck bed seems to have warped the frame beyond use. They flare out and sit around 30 degrees off my ear, creating a flap look. If I had an old school toboggan I could keep the ear pieces in place but for now the plastic has completely warped and rendered them unusable. I'll admit it's been hot lately, but that's still no excuse.

In the end If they're for inside work, your room or dorm, class, car rides, or anything in an air controlled room they're perfect. If you live down south, are suffering through a heat wave, exercise profusely, or encounter any heat beyond 80 degrees I'd recommend paying more for a better pair. In fact Sony makes a set that I used in the sauna for six months straight, and they were only ten bucks more.

Oh, and I know most people won't care but the color selection is pretty awesome. If I ever need a set for work i'll come back and buy that mint pair, they're nifty!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought these for my daughter to take to computer lab at school and was not looking to spend a fortune as they will be left at school. I did not have super high expectations. Got these and tested the comfort and sound quality. Now my wife wants a pair as well. The color match to the image is dead on and the sound quality and fit is terrific. I hope these will maintain that throughout the year. The folding capability is nice but having a case or carrying bag to take full advantage of this benefit would be my only suggestion. The cord is very comfortable as well as it is wrapped with a shoe lace like material. Would highly recommend this set and now have to wait for my wife to pick the color she wants.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
This is the second pair I've bought for my daughter. They both started out great. Very comfortable, light-weight, great sound, but then after a few weeks, the sound becomes intermittent. We are finding that there must be a short in the wire and you have to hold or manipulate the cord in a certain way and hold it in place to keep the sound coming through.
Will not purchase again and do not recommend.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: OMG! I LOVE THESE HEADPHONES!!! First of all, I love the design especially since it matches my phone cover so well. I love how the jack is bent so as not to get a short when I put my phone in my pocketbook. BUT THE SPEAKERS!!!! AWESOME SOUND!! I FELT LIKE I WAS AT A SHOW AND HEARING MY SONGS IN PERSON!! They are definitely lightweight and foldable which is a plus. I would definitely recommend these headphones to EVERYBODY!! The price is great too! I've gone through so many headphones that its unbelievable!! I love these so much that I'm buying another - I saw a set that would match my outfit. :D

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I am incredibly impressed. I thought that these would just be decent headphones at the price point. Considering their advertising is heavily focused on how stylish they are, I figured that's what the products highlight would be. I was so wrong.
I don't even know where to start. Besides how absolutely attractive these are, they are also comfortable. Seriously. They are so light that it's easy to forget your wearing them. They are completely padded with what feels almost like a temperpedic bed. The ear pads are soft and have a lot of give so instead of crushing your ears like most round pads they cushion them. I can wear these for hours on end without any discomfort.
The audio blew me away. Not only do these cut out so much outside noise that it's hard for me to hear myself talking while listening to anything. They also have virtually no sound leakage. The bass, treble, and all those other terms are well balanced. The music sounds right. It sounds like what I would expect from a headset of at least $60 bare minimum. I can so easily get lost in my music with these. The sound isn't grainy, or harsh. It's soft, clear and has the perfect bass level. Even for gaming these are amazing. I pick up on so many more sounds while gaming now.
I'm completely in love with these. Even if these were $60 I would still highly recommend them. I've bought a pair of sony headphones for the same price in store and if I was blindly given both of them and told the price of the sony headphones and had to guess the I35's. I would assume these were at least $60 but more likely to be $80+. A fantastic product that I wish I could give 10 stars to. I've already talked a friend into buying a pair.

Extremely highly recommend.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I have had it for about a month now and everything works just fine. It will change tracks on your smart phone, meaning music by pushing the button on the microphone. The telephone side of the works excellent as well. It fits very well over the head and is very comfortable. The only small drawback is is a little bit lacking in bass, but I guess that's to be expected for the price. I really wanted something that would change my musical tracks without having to take my smart phone out of my pocket and was also very comfortable. I would say that this is a very nice unit for traveling outdoors and going places. If you're looking for something just to listen to music to at home, I would recommend a more powerful bass response headphone system. But everything works and messy important thing. You push the button twice no changes to the next track, whether you have a your system on shuffle or you are playing an entire album. So everything works fine.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

They easily fold up when not in use. Not only are they comfortable, they're stylish. SO many colors to choose from. I definitely recommend.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I originally bought these in March of 2016 for use at work because I don't like having ear buds embedded in my ear for the long conference calls I sometimes have to take. The ear buds get uncomfortable after awhile. So the first pair I bought, I inadvertantly broke myself while working out. Unfortunately, after some months of use on the second set, the female part of assembly that allows the left ear piece to flex has now broken (Chipped Away), not through rough use or damage, but through regular use. The pin that inserts into the assembly will no longer stay in position, leaving the left ear piece dangling. The Audio quality was good both send and receive and they were comfortable. I liked these, and for the price they work, but this is the second set I've gone through in 6 months. I will be trying a different set next time.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Could easily be a 5 star product for others, but I had to deduct a star as it puts a lot of pressure on your ears making it harder to wear for more than 3 hours at a time, and I bought these for use at my home computer.

But for the price, they are very good headphones and deliver nice sound quality, while allowing you to still hear others. I live with my grandparents and so it's important that I hear them if they yell up to me from downstairs.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I use these headphones for listening to music, recording vocals, and mixing my vocals. They're very good quality and the headphones are so pretty! I ordered mine in light blue+purple and I just love the color. I don't have anything to complain about in terms of quality- I've only had a few pairs of headphones over the course of my life but these are the best-quality ones I have yet.

I've had them for almost a year and they haven't broken like some other customers have complained about. The only complaint I have is they hurt my ears after a while, but for only $20 what can you expect? I probably won't buy them again as I'm planning on upgrading all my equipment, but I'd definitely recommend these.

I tried to crazy glue it back together but I don't know how helpful that will be. Attached is a photo, the right side (where you see the black part) is the piece that fell off. Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I think I should have paid more attention to all the reviews that said these were being used by a teen. These are okay but after several uses I passed them onto a teen as well. They aren't noise cancelling and they never fit my adult head and habits that well. On the other hand the teen lives them. Great color though.

Months later: Ailihen just contacted me based on my review to see if another product would be a better fit. I think this is an excellent example of great customer attentiveness. Bravo, Ailihen!

Okay, I got the new ones--the gold ones Ailihen recommended. I've been using them fo months. Verdict? I so appreciate Ailihen's intervention. When I travel, they go with me. A four-hour layover in Seattle Airport TWICE led to extensive use of my headphones. Comfortable and effective. Great sound AND I heard the boarding announcement. Kudos to my headphones and Ailihen.

Please know I got the second pair free and that's all. The previous pair for which I paid and passed on to a friend are still being used and enjoyed. I did right and so did Ailihen.

Reviews:

They are pretty comfortable, easy to adjust, the sound quality is good, and they do a pretty good job with noise-cancelling (not total silence, but pretty quiet).

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This headset works beautifully with iPhone and Droid cell phones. I'm impressed with the noise-cancelling quality of the headphones. I barely hear anyone speaking to me. I ordered the aqua and purple set and love the colors. The head set is adjustable and comfortable on the head. The ear covers are soft and cushioned which makes them very comfortable for extended wear.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones are hardly ever used by my son. We've had them 3 months and they've been used maybe 3 times. My son was sitting on his iPad with these things on, when this wire slips right on out! There was no pulling or tugging. I watched it fall effortlessly out. Such a shame! I'm past my return window so I'm out the $20. Very bummed about this and my 3 year old is sad we can't use this on our 7 hour car trip this weekend :(

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones are great... for 3 months. I purchased theses headphones a while ago and they broke after 3 months. The company gave me a replacement and another 5 months they broke... AGAIN. The earpiece broke off and they keep pulling up Siri without me wanting to. Since they were "out of warranty" they aren't sending me new ones or giving me some refund. Don't buy these unless you want them runiend.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Decent sound quality for the price, nothing to brag about. My nephew complained they were a little tight on his head causing headaches, and he is only 13. They also broke around the ear cushion hinge opposite to the corded side after about 2-3 months of use. At about 4 months of having them, they are almost completely falling about, being held together by a menagerie of tape and glue. And this is a 13-year old that panics if anyone even breathes too hard near his electronics, he isn't exactly being rough with them. Really sad that his younger brother's dollar store generic rip-off brand headphones have lasted three times as long as these with the exact same quality and features.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I purchased these for a long road trip. First appearance when opening these box was these are very good quality. I purchased the aqua and purple set and the color is spot on match. They fit my 4 year old well and are very soft on her ears. These will also fit an older child as they seem flexible. The cord is long so it can reach a device further away which is a plus for us. She can sit back from the DVD player in our SUV and the cord reaches with ease. The sound quality is good she has no issues hearing over road noise. This was a good purchase.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I have placed an order for these headphones 3 times, the last 2 for other people. I love them and everybody else seems to as well.
They're incredibly cute and pretty well-made for the price and I've found the sound to be good and sufficient for the average user. Highly recommed and I'm pretty sure I'll order again for somebody else.
They do have ONE drawback, and I've seen other reviewers mentions this - they can kinda hurt, specially if you're not used to wearing this style of headphones.
I solved this issue by stretching then out on the actual box they came in while I was not wearing them. After a while, good to go.

Good product even though.....

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I really like these headphones, and it has a high volume output. I like the covered cable and it's virtually impossible for the cord to tangle unless you do it on purpose, the only thing is that after wearing them for some time my right ear starts hurting, I don't think the shape of the muffs agree with that ear for some reason. I've tried adjusting the position on my ear but it still ends up hurting. Good quality for the price though

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I love these headphones. I saw some conflicting reviews. A lot of reviews said that these were for children. I decided to get them anyway since I am on the small side (adult woman). They fit me great. My husband put them on and they fit him alright too. The sound quality is pretty decent. They do a good job canceling outside sound as well. I like that you can push the button to pause and skip to the next song or video.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Right out of the package these are my 4 years old's favorite new headphones, which is what I was hoping for. Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Sound quality is good enough, but first week, one ear pad fell off. Then after a couple more weeks, the other ear pad fell off. I had already discarded the packaging, so I couldn't return. Impossible to get the pads back on. Yesterday, I walked in and found my daughter taping the pads back on with black electrical tape. These are garbage.

*****UPDATE***** After my negative review of the product, the seller contacted me and offered a replacement. They did send a replacement and I am very happy with their customer service. So, while I don't know how long the replacement will last, the seller is EXCELLENT! So, you can have confidence buying products from this seller, they will help you if anything goes wrong with your product. Thank you very much!!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I LOVE these headphones! The color is super cute though they're definitely more mint/turquoise than light blue. For the price, these are pretty great. The sound quality is nice and rich, the cord is sturdy and much longer than I expected it to be, and they're extremely comfortable to wear for a long time. I've only owned them for a couple of weeks, but so far these are probably the best headphones I've ever had. If your the sort to take care of your things like I am, I can see these lasting a decent while.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Comfortable, good sound, but poor construction. The braiding around the wire is what initially sold me cause it tends to be a pinch point that is first to short out on cheaper headsets. The inline controls for audio play with my Galaxy 6S are very convenient. However, the plastic bracket/hinge holding the ear-muff to the headband seemed to be the poorly designed pinch point for this device. It worked great for a couple months then snapped while wearing. They never received any stress so I found it odd that it snapped like it did. Perhaps defected from the get-go. Regardless, they are totally worth purchasing again and I would recommend them for watching movies on a laptop, tablet, smartphone, etc..

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Headphones are toast one month after purchase. These are nice looking headphones and seem like they should be durable. I chose them because the matched my kindle case and also because after so many dead headphones due to shorts, these have a nice insulated cable.Alas they didn't short out but instead the headband where the speaker connects broke.

I should also mention that they were always uncomfortable for my adult size head so maybe these are for kids. So to sum up, mine are broken, they were too tight on my ears and they are cute and solid looking if not well constructed in reality. So buy at your own risk. I now will invest in a more expensive pair. I hesitate to do so only because I've gone through so many earbuds and headphones this year. Can't anybody make a durable and reliable headphone/earphone that does't break or short out within a few months?

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
This headset was okay as far as comfort and sound quality are concerned, but the attachment of the earpiece to the headband is poorly designed. Mine broke after less than 3 months of light use, and cannot be repaired. I got mine with a $4.00 promotional discount, so $5/month for a disposable item is not too bad. I'm now going to try the Amazon Basics model AmazonBasics Lightweight On-Ear Headphones - Black, and gladly say goodbye to the horrible orange color!

Follow-up. Alihen monitors their customer reviews. When they read mine, despite the fact that the headset was beyond the return period, they promptly sent me a brand new replacement headset. You can't ask for better Customer Service than that!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I bought these for my 11yo daughter to use with a Chromebook. She loved the colors and wanted to use them for video chat with her friends.

I also tested them with my ps4. I played a few games and no one complained about my mic. They said I sound good. This gave me pretty good stereo sound and I wouldn't mind grabbing a pair to use as my permanent headphones for gaming.

I didn't get to test with music but, I like a little more bass than this putout.

For $20 you cant really give these a bad review.

So far, it does all three!
So the sound quality gave me more than i was expecting from headphones

The button on the cord does pair with my iphone 7+, so im sure it will work
to answer or make google requests.

I made contact with the company and explained the problem, the company wrote me back, they were very pro-active, they asked me to send pics of the headphone, I did, then they suggested to me that they would offer me a new replacement headphone. Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I compared these headphones to my sony white foldable head phones. The sound quality isn't %100, but isn't that bad either (I personally love a lot of bass). The headphones are a very snug fit (I guess I have to use them to get use to them) and turn more inward than flat on the ears which creates a more sound canceling outside of your environment. The color is as shown, very bright and vibrant mint color. The cord is the best part of these headphones due to it being fabric and not actual plastic (my cat likes to chew on headphones), and the cord is very long and also has a mic/pause/play button on it!

Reviews: Female adult here and these fit great. You can adjust them A LOT. I was worried they wouldn't fit when they arrived but they did and are super comfortable for long days of wear. I use these at work to tune out and their sound quality is good but their sound noise cancelling is amazing. I don't have to have it loud in order to drown everything else out. Seems good quality so far and the color is awesome.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these headphones for my 10 year old for Christmas. Although it is only January 2nd, he uses them often and will bring them to school to be used in their computer centers. He loves the vibrant orange color and will always be able to pick his out in a line up. The sound quality is ok but probably not what an a real sound snob would like. They are perfect for what I bought them for and I would rebuy this if needed.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This is the second pair of these headphones I have purchased. Now my daughter has one for school(she needs them for audiobooks) and we bought this pair for home. She uses them daily and LOVES them. The quality is excellent. We have had the first pair for over a year and they are still going strong. I am so impressed with these headphones. I would definitely recommend these! Amazing quality for such an inexpensive price!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: The headphones are well made and hold up to young kids' using them. I can't speak to the sound quality as I haven't personally tested them out much, but I haven't heard any complaints. My little girl was somewhat disappointed that the wrong color was shipped to me, though. I ordered the pretty green (aqua?) and purple ones, but received the gray and green ones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones are great! I have bought a few pair of these & will buy more. With a family of 5, someone is always looking for headphones to watch a video or listen to music. These are great for watching videos & TV shows online (what I use them for). Music sounds great with them too. I really liked the cord on these (shoestring type cord) because they don't tangle as badly. My oldest son is a musician & when he comes to visit, he always "borrows" these & takes them home with him & to plug into his guitar & play without using an amp/speaker to practice. I like the headband on these vs some of the other brands because it hold up to kids pulling them off (they tend to pull them off in such a way that breaks the headband).

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: If you have one flight with kids and need a glorified throwaway set of headphones, then you could consider these. The sound quality is atrocious, embarrassing compared to an average adult set. If quality is even a smidgeon of a factor for you, spend an extra few dollars and get a better set. If price is your only motivating factor, then these are hard to beat.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Color and sound is fine, what really irks me about this product though is that when using it with my iphone, it'll somehow trigger Siri, or cause my music to fast forward or skip to the end of the song. NO idea what causes this, but my audio imput is clean and no other headset does this. Pretty clear that these headphones are the cause. Thought I could ignore it since it only happened rarely when I first bought it, but incidents have been happening with increasing frequency lately.

Really annoying when I wanna jam out but my tunes keep getting interrupted by Siri asking me whats up.

Would not buy again.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Wow! I just got these, put them on, and they blew my socks right off the soles of my feet. For the price I paid ($16.99)??? They remind me of the Bose headphones I got at Costco for $169. That's 10 times what I paid for these. And yes, they are incredibly comfortable! They are as comfortable as those Bose headphones were, too. You should definitely buy these.

And by the way, I rarely give a product review, but these folks really deserve the boost in their ratings. Great product.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: So I will start this off with that I really like the headphones. They have great sound quality, which I was a bit worried about, and are rather comfortable. The only complaint I have is that the earmuffs are a lot smaller than I was expecting. They don't cup your ears, they just rest over them. Which is not what I was going for. So be aware of that if you are going for headphones that fully cover, as in "cup around" your ears rather than just sit on them. These do not do that. But if that isn't a big deal for you these are really great! Great bass and sound, comfortable to wear both on the ears and the band that rests on your head. It has a different type of cord that feels sort of like a cloth mesh that is easily untangled which is nice. It has a mic for phone calls but I haven't tried that yet. Over all great set of headphones and I do suggest it for the price and quality.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Perfect for my needs. It does get a tad bit uncomfy for long periods, but thats okay. I love the color purple/pink in that it discourages my husband from stealing it from me. The mic is super handy to talk through as well.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphone are okay I guess... if you like having a burden on your ears.

The sound quality from these headphones are more like a distant sound, not as vivid, and unclear.
When you wear the headphones, after a good 5 or 10 minutes, my ears started to hurt, and it was just an uncomfortable feeling to witness.
The headphones definetly do bend, but when bent, they are still a bit big, defeating the purpose.

The only reason I barely like this is because I personally think the design in cool, just that the qualities lack a ton. 2 stars...

I bought them to replace my broken set of headphones (one of a long line of ones whose cords frayed and whose sound just quit) so i'm not sure how they'll hold up. Hopefully, they'll last.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are headphones for those of us who are not worried about high quality. They are just as expected. Take care of the cord, which is a good length if you do not need extra for walking away from the item you are connecting to. But they are definitely for smaller heads. I always forget to look at how the headphone ear pieces close tightly together in the picture. I need the kind that have a separation and are not squeezing your head. Also the length change comes just at the end of both sides of the earphones. It is just a few inches and there is not angle change, just a length change. I prefer the angle to move also. My kids took them from me which works well for them. I need a pair that is a little more flexible for my head and has just a little bit bigger foam ear cups.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Has very nice bass and sound. The cord is protected by a soft cotton-like rope, making it hard to damage. The color is very cute and fashionable, so it can be used as an accessory too. I did sprint intervals and didn't need to adjust them even once, much better than ear buds which would periodically fall out no matter what I did. The only problem, is that they are difficult to sleep in and prolonged use (four hours+) makes my ears sore. They can be worn with freshly pierced earrings if you adjust them at the right angle. Overall a very nice product, I would definitely by another pair for just exercising! Also, the sound is great compared to beats and bose headphones. In my opinion, they are better than beats. However, bose headphones block out ALOT of noise. When I put these on it muffles noise and when I turn the volume up high I can block out loud radio sounds, but bose heaphones I can't hear anything, so overall a very nice product at a cheap price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I ordered one and liked it so well I ordered another a few months later. Good sound and seem to hold up to my jerking around on the ear piece and cables. Feels good on the ear. Is large enough to help block out other outside noises.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: When we received these we like the color but the ear piece fabric came off on the same day. Also you could not hear in them very well they weren't very loud. We had to rig them to actually get to where you could hear good. Definitely a waste of money! My daughter was so disappointed. I would not recommend these to anyone. !!! (mad.sad face)

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These were great until they just stopped working with two months of use.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: It's get what you pay for. 20 USD justifies the bad ergonomics, lack of noise-cancellation (and why was this listed when I specified noise cancellation on the filters?). The headphones only swivel on the horizontal axis and goes up and down for head size... but sadly it doesn't swivel on the forward- backward axis. Now this will be fine with people with small heads, but not to me. It feels awkward and my ears feels it's not completely covered.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I accidently bought two (my fault). I'm keeping the one I opened and returning the other. I don't even want to give those away. The sound is good. But they are not comfortable. The ear pieces have no lateral flexibility and so don't seat properly. And, the whole thing feels like a big, stiff and painful headband. Really wanted to love these.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: My daughter is happy with these, but after a month, a piece of the cord that looked like a patch wore off and exposed frayed wires. My husband patched them back together, but I guess you get what you pay for!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Was pretty happy with these for a few weeks but suddenly whenever I have these headphones plugged in, it screws with the volume and play/stop controls. More or less makes these useless since I can't listen to a song for 10 seconds without it pausing and going to no sound to max volume and then skipping to the next song. I've used other headphones since with no issue, so it's definitely this pair.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are actually on-ear, not over-ear. I felt the distinction was necessary for comfort reasons--On-ear headphones make my ears sore after a while from pressing onto my ears, so for extended use I don't see myself using them, hence the four stars. Otherwise it's a very good product-- I do use them for Skype conversations for work, which is the main reason I bought mic headphones, and the orange color is REALLY REALLY bright, like neon-level. The collapsibility is nice for storage. I'll be looking into getting Over-Ear pads that fit these for comfort purposes.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are comfortable easily portable headphones. The sound quality is absolutely fine for my listening. I use them at work with music on low to block out surrounding noise. I bought a second pair for my husband. Unfortunately, our puppy immediately ate through the cord (good reminder to keep things out of reach). I liked them so much that I immediately got him another pair to replace the first one. My wish for improvement would be to make the cord detachable as that seems to be where headphones are most vulnerable. Overall, these headphones are a great value for the price. They arrived on time. I love the color selection.

Reviews: Very durable

Reviews: Bought two pairs and both have same issue. Under engineered ear levers hinges the ear pieces broke the same way on both pairs, thus the hinge pins fall right out. Otherwise good headphones but faulty design. Took roughly 3 months both time for them to fail.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I'm not some super picky music aficionado, but these are a great product for an incredible price. They do a pretty reasonable job of noise cancelling, which will be nice on airplanes (I bought an airplane adapter). I use these for all my lengthy phone calls and they work great for that. No one says they can't hear me. I have a Lifeproof case, and I've just whittled down all the extra plastic on the plug so that I can insert it directly into the case without the adapter. I bought the case too (I think there wasn't one specifically for these headphones, but same brand nearly identical had a case), so I can fling them around everywhere. Very happy with this purchase!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Very small, uncomfortable, and hard. These are definitely children's headphones. The sound is also very tinny. I was so disappointed when I unboxed them and tried them out. I immediately exchanged them for a better known brand that was a little more expensive.

One star only for the braided cord, which I was rather impressed by the quality of.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This is the first set of headphones I found that I love! The price is very reasonable. They fold up great for storage. They fit snug around my head without any pain that I had experienced in the past with other headphones; thanks to the cushioning around the ear pieces. These headphones were for my work and I have no trouble keeping out the unwanted noise from the office. Also, my music has never sounded so great! I am definitely going to buy a pair for my home. I would recommend this for anyone who doesn't want to buy expensive headphones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these for my 12 year old daughter who used them daily at school and at home. She liked the comfort and sound of the headphones but they didn't last long. Less than 3 months after purchasing them, the plastic clamping band that hold the ear piece to the headband came apart. I thought my daughter broke them but after close inspection, I found the two Phillips screws that hold the clap together are just too short and don't thread very far into a female stud on the opposite side of the clamp.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
The Headphones look, sound and feel like a premium quality, as its new. Will update this review after using in my way for couple of weeks.

Foam seems addictively squishy, doesn't irritate much on your ears. Though they Warm your ears, if not placed correctly or used continously. Hanging around neck seems painful, of course depends on neck size. Personally, its a bad idea, i felt like ostrich dropping them around neck. Nilon wire seems solid and strengthy. Never rely on edges, as that's where the headphones fail most of the times. Wire outlet from the earphone seems delicate and other edge towards jack is strong.

Surprise amazon coupon inside which will give you 20% off on your next purchase of Ailihen products only, probably another Headphone.

For the price, the build quality just seems shocking. I have seen cheaper build qualities priced high. This one seems top notch among the competitors.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Great headphone for the money. They are comfortable to wear. The bass is solid, although not overpowering. They are designed to let you have a very pleasant musical experience. They are not a Beats clone which have a tendency to emphasize the bass region at the sacrifice of the mid and upper musical ranges. The cord is long enough for any application. They are not noise cancelling, but once the music is playing you will not notice a lot of sound from the outside environment. I purchased the hard shell case and will take them on my next flight. The headphones and the case come in for under $30. You can certainly spend a lot more and there are better sounding headphones out there, but for under $20 you will not find any headphone that even comes close. If you want the absolute best, buy a headphone from Bose. If you are looking for a great value, look no further.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: My daughter needed new headphones for her iPod because let's face it, those little buds that come with it just won't stay in an 11-year old's ears. After looking around I found these and took a chance that they might do the trick, you never know with a pre-teen girl what she will like. Needless to say, she loved the color and thought that they were awesome, so score one for mom, finally! They are noise reducing which she loves as it drowns out her little brother, but not me or so she says. I just remind her that I will only repeat myself twice and that I don't mind dancing in public to get her attention. I figure a little public humiliation never hurt anyone, especially me. So far they work perfectly with her iPod and her PC so I can't complain and I really like that they fold up to be compact and don't take up a lot of space. They are very padded and look comfortable, but I wonder how they will feel this summer in the Alabama heat while we do yard work. Overall, excellent product for and excellent price in my opinion.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are good headphones for the money. My one complaint would be that, like a lot of other headphones, the audio channels in the Stereo feature feed into each other where you can hear both channels prominently in the other even when the sound is supposed to be isolated to one side. This is a minor annoyance for headphones I paid this little for. The sound quality and the depth of the bass is really great for what they cost. And they even have a microphone, which I haven't tested yet. Best of all, I mean, I don't have to worry too much about losing them or tearing them up because they barely costed anything. If they last a year or two, that's a big value for the price tag.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I really like the stylish color scheme of these headphones. I bought them for my daughter to use and the purple on black works well for her. The sound quality is excellent, especially for the price range. They are also very soft and comfortable to wear. The volume control is easy to use for kids. The cable is braided which helps keep it from kinking and means it should last a lot longer. Finally, I really like that these fold up for easy storage or to take on a trip.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I bought these for my daughter to use with her Samsung NoteTab 4. At first they did not work, but it was a setting on the tablet; so make sure to check all the settings first if they seem not to work.

First impression was well built and soft ear cups. They did not work initially, as stated above, with her tablet, so I plugged them into my LG G3 and turned on some tunes. I was not expecting the clarity and volume of the sound. I cranked it up and really no discernible distortion at full volume. The cord length is adequate, but it does tend to tangle up. There is also no protection at the cord junction to the ear cup, so hopefully the cord does not get pulled out or bent and shorted.

She uses them all the time, since April, and they are still holding shape and comfort. The sound has not deteriorated and she still folds them up without any issues. She has a habit of letting things lay about and sometimes get sat on when left on the couch under a blanket. They are still in one piece and working great.

For the clarity and volume of sound, the durability, and the price these are a great buy - out weighs potential issues one might run into with the cord.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones do not work with my smartphone (samsung galaxy j7). Every time they are plugged in, my media volume will randomly, and sometimes several times in rapid succession, drop my media volume all the way down or turn it all the way up. This makes them completely unusable as I intensely dislike having my music turned off repeatedly and also having it unpredictably blast so loudly that it hurts my ears. The color scheme is nice, the cord is durable, and the audio quality is acceptable. Unfortunately these good qualities have no bearing on the one all-encompassing detractor.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These were very cool visually but uncomfortable to wear over glasses; the earpiece is small and sits much more on top of the ear than other over-the-ear headphones I've tried, which used some of the space around the ear. I have a smallish head so I was surprised that they were too tight when I was wearing glasses (they were comfortable without the glasses).

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: To prevent hearing loss, I wanted to buy over the ear headphones for watching TV (as I don't want to annoy family, I use headphones). These are a lovely color, adjust fit easily, and the sound is great, you barely have to turn up the volume. For value (as headphones can get pricey), these are worth the price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are great! The cord is very durable-seeming, and the whole design is nice. The only thing that would make these better would be if they had different sizes for different-sized heads. I think my head is average-sized, but these feel tight. Wearing it for hours can give me a headache.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Oh my goodness...these feel like butter! The material they used is luxury. They look very comfortable on my kiddos too (ages 7 and 9)...they dont look too tight at all. I am so happy with this purchase.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This is the best set of wired headphones I've ever tried. For the price, I wasn't expecting much but after opening the package, I found an extremely high quality product. The materials used on these look like what you would find on more expensive headphones. The leather ear cups and headband are very soft and comfortable. The cord is wrapped in a braided material similar to shoelaces and is just long enough. The sound on these is amazing. I played hip hop music and the bass is tight without being overwhelming. There is very little sound leakage when wearing these. I have no complaints at all and recommend to anyone.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I really love these headphones. They are very comfortable and help cancel out my co-worker's annoying radio. They also work with my ipad so I can listen to my own music. Excellent price and good quality. I would purchase again.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these for my 5 year old, and am not disappointed. They are so incredibly soft and comfortable, plus the cord feels more like a shoelace, which should be much more durable. The sound quality is great as well. Very happy with my purchase.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Very nice headphones. Purchased these for my daughter after a pair of earbuds didn't fit properly. These are cushioned, adjustable, colorful, and sturdy. The cord is encased inside fabric/woven material and seems to be much more durable that regular headphone/earbud cords. The plug would not work in the earphone jack on the front of a computer tower, however it apparently works in the back earphone jack. These exceeded my expectations in both price and quality, seem like they will last, and my daughter says they are comfortable. Would recommend this to anyone not keen on the idea of earbuds, and/or want something comfy to listen to music/do techy activities.

Reviews: These headphones work for the amount of money that it costs. For cheap headphones, this is okay. Other people can hear what you're listening to from the outside, but it's fairly faint until the sound is fairly loud. I think it is good for louder places where nice headphones would get ruined, which is what I used it for. I had brought it to swim meets and because it was cheap, didn't care about the water getting close to them. They also have microphones that can be turned on and off, which is extremely handy. Overall, very good for the cheap price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:

My only concern is that sometimes the volume on my phone will be at its lowest setting but my headphone volume will be stuck at a volume that is to high for me. My next headphones will have volume control.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphones are really cute and are very study from a craftsmanship standpoint, but unfortunately they are so tight that they give me a headache every time I try to wear them, it's literally like having my head squashed by a vice. No adjustment seems to help, so I just wear them for 30 minutes at a time since that's all I can tolerate. Maybe it's me, but I don't perceive that I have a giant head like the kid in So I Married An Axe Murderer.

The sound is just okay, to me it's personally a bit muddy. For the price I wasn't expecting the quality of my late beloved Bose headphones, but it's still kind of a bummer.

Reviews:
***update 11/10. When the seller saw my review I got an email asking if I would like the 2 headphones I purchased and had some problems with, refunded or would I like 2 new ones. We chose to try them again. This time we are being a little more careful with them. They are super soft and great sound. Kids enjoy them. I'm very grateful to the seller for reaching out...shows great customer service. We did get only one headphone replacement , but I believe the second one will come.

Really great sound, cancels noise from outside well. The kids said they are really comfortable. I bought one for each kid for our two week vacation. By day three my son's feel apart. One pin broke and it fell off, then next day they comfort part fell off. We sorta got them back together. On the last day my daughters had the comfort part fall off too. I'm disappointed at how easily they broke...defiantly not meant for kids.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: First I was sent the wrong color but then Amazon told me I could just keep them at no charge so I figured, what the heck, these will do. Well, I've used other headphones on my laptop but the connector prong on this set not only doesn't fit in the hole securely but if you do plug it in all the way, the sound cuts off. So you have to pull it out just enough that it connects. Believe me, it's not very convenient when I'm using them on a conference call, I turn my head, the cord comes out and I just missed what was said. Additionally, they put quite a lot of pressure your ears and I have a small head! Would not buy again.

Reviews: Soft and stylish. However, if you are looking for a pari of headphones that your confident your child will handle gently, then these headphones are for you. I found these to be really pretty. Packaging was nice and headphones were super soft. My daughter also loved the colors. Unfortunately, the soft headphone part fell off with ease. The day I gave it to her for Christmas, and she is really responsible with her belongings. I saw it happen. I cannot in good faith give this a 5 star rating because of how easily the soft part of the headphones that fell off was could not be placed back on the headphones. I am really hoping that I just got a pair of headphones that were defective.

Reviews: These headphones appear to be good value. I bought five of them in the last year for my daughters. All broke or stopped working within a few months. The first was minor, the headphone speaker cushion fell off, as if not enough glue. I just noticed that one of my daughters put another headphone in the cart and I was thinking this whole time that they just wanted new colors - nope. They told me just now they don't work. I searched my order history and found five orders for these headphones. Good value but they are low quality. The sound is good and lightweight but don't expect a long life out of them. Gave them two stars since they're inexpensive.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I honestly love these. They're really comfortable, the sound is clean, definitely worth the price. I like the braided cord, hoping it will help the headphones last longer. I took off a star because the ear pads were a bit smaller than I thought they'd be. It's not a problem for me since I'm only 5 feet tall but I wouldn't buy these for my partner who is 6 feet tall. Seems best suited for children and small adults. I saw another review that talked about how uncomfortable these were for them but I haven't had any discomfort and have been able to wear them for extended periods of time. However, as I mentioned, they are a bit on the smaller side and I could see how they may cause discomfort if the fit isn't right. I don't know that I'd go as far as to say that these are noise canceling headphones. They do muffle surrounding sounds and you can definitely turn up the volume to drown anything else out but they're not going to give you the same noise canceling as the more expensive headphone brands. Overall, I'm really happy with them and would recommend them to children, teens, and small adults.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones have great sound for the cost. My only complaint is that they stiff and can be a bit uncomfortable to wear for extended periods of time. However, they isolate outside sounds pretty well for headphones in this price range. Overall I'm very satisfied. They arrived quickly the color is just as pictured and is super cute and they extend easily (for those us with larger heads). Hopefully they become more comfortable with wear.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I like to wait a few months before I write an honest review. We have had these headphones for roughly 7 months now and I have purchased more expensive headphones for my children at big box stores; however, these have held up the best. No exposed wires and are hardly showing anywhere and tear at all. Best part is they are really comfortable and cover the entire ear. Everyone in the house, adults included, fight over these headphones. I will be buying a few more pairs.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This headphone was lightweight and foldable (making it easy to throw into our travel bag). It fit my daughter's head and ears comfortably (6 years old). The added sound button on the cord was a nice addition. Both children were quiet the whole way (all 8 hours). I'm hoping they hold up all year long. So far, I am really pleased.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Quick service, comfy fit (I have a small head and many headphones just fall off) and they block out other noise effectively. Sound quality if also very good!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I saw the good reviews so I thought I would buy some for my sons. The audio quality was OK for their short lives of a couple days. My sons destroyed the three of these I bought. They are VERY cheaply made. Ear cups fell off and chords easily ripped out making them useless. Don't expect these to last long. They were a waste of money and I highly regret my purchase.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Great headphones for my 12-year old. The color is beautiful. My daughter loves the pause button and she finds it very comfortable. I like the folding ability. It makes storing and traveling with them so much easier. We only got it recently, so we can't comment on durability but we're happy so far.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

UPDATE: ReviewMeta says the reviews for this product FAIL its testing system. That means a majority of them are fake. Buyer beware.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: The cord is way too long. I'm 5'5" and my phone can be flat on the ground and the headphones are still on my ears. Also the music is slightly muffled. But they work for the gym. I'm gonna have to find something to do with the extensive cord.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
They worked for the first time and then promptly bent and the end of the jack broke off into my tablet as we were pulling it out and couldn't be fixed. I ended up having to get a replacement tablet, thankfully I had an extended service plan with it that helped cover the cost.

Update: customer service promptly contacted me and offered resolution in form of new set or refund and also offering to pay for the tablet repair ( which was not necessary). I would deal with them again

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Advertised as over-ear headphones, but are actually on-ear headphones. I liked the idea of foldable over-ear headphones, but upon arrival I quickly saw the product was smaller than expected, barely fitting my head, and the earpass sitting on my ears. As such, for an adult these are definitely not over-ear headphones! For kids they may be...

I returned the product because after wearing them for 30 minutes my ears hurt a lot. I wear glasses and this product made me very aware of that.

Great headphones for kids, not for adults. These are NOT over-ear, so misadvertised!!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This didn't even last 90 days and the electronic wires are exposed on the mute button on the cord. The plastic piece covering them came off and all the circuits are exposed. Seems VERY dangerous for a kid product. My child uses these sitting calmly on the couch, in full view of adults, and the product has not been misused. I want to return it but it looks like this item has been taken down - likely for the same issue.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: your ears would have to be one inch long to fit inside these as you would assume if you used these kinds of headphone berfore. so maybe these are little kids headphones? not for adults, but I dont feel like returning them and looking again, so I'll keep them as they dont hurt my ears.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought these because of the many great reviews for my 11 yr old daughter. She used it to watch videos for homeschool and occasional YouTube videos. Within 6 months, the wire connecting the headphones became jiggly and headphones went out on both ears. I am really disappointed because she really takes care of the things she has and never leaves them around the house. I would have been fine if they lasted a couple of years for the money we paid.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Nice headphones. Sound quality is not the best but good for the price. They block out a good amount if noise, but not all of it. I also have not noticed any sound leakage. They are a little bit large for my head, but I've got a rather small head and they are adjustable for larger head sizes. The colors are nice (I got the teal ones). The only part that seems like it may be a problem is the microphone button on the chord. The plastic seems cheap and likely to break if too much pressure is applied. Otherwise a really nice product for a good price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: The sound is excellent, but the phones will KILL your outer ears if you wear them the wrong way. For the first week, I had to take them off every 5-10 minutes to pull and stretch my ears and alleviate the soreness. I'd tried adjusting the band and no position seemed to work well. Since there are no right and left markers, I just assumed the wired side was the right channel until i listened to a track that i knew had isolated vocals in the left channel. Turned out I had been wearing them the wrong way. Obviously, they're much more comfortable now, but Ailihen should consider at least telling people which is the left and right phone. Of course it's ultimately user error, but in the age of ignorance, they should be more proactive. :-)

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are adequate, but some sound leaks so I don't use them on my train commute. Bass becomes distorted when volume is increased. But for just going for a nice long walk these are perfect. Great fit and they don't move around. The overall sound is good. The sound doesn't have to be loud to enjoy the music. Well balanced. I like them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: For $13 this is a great buy. The audio quality is great. The build quality is great. The phones have a nice soft feel texture and they fit nicely. The colors are fun. The 5 ft cord is a soft fabric. The ear pieces are soft and feel great on my ears. The phones come with an in-line microphone and a small button to answer incoming calls. You will get a users guide and a product warranty card.They provide customer service and a phone number to call. You have a one year limited warranty. This company is providing a very nice product and customer service. Good bass.The shipping box is perfect for storing the phones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
They are beautiful, they fit great and the sound is perfect. I needed a new headset for my computer and this was exactly what I was looking for. I have trouble fitting a headset because my head is either too small for adult and too small for a youth, but these feel good and they don't hurt after wearing them for long periods of time.

Update: I am going to purchase a second set. After 2 years of very heavy use the L side broke at the pin part. My hubby tried to glue them back together, and they are working for now. I loved the fit and the sound. Where they broke is where I am constantly pulling them off. So, I think this is everyday wear and tear on them. I'm surprised they lasted as long as they have considering the abuse they have had.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Really love it! We needed a new set of headphones for my son. These are a favorite color of him, they feel soft and of a good quality. They don't have the strongest bass thumping abilities, but for the price point, they provide a good, rich sound. There is even decent noise isolation, not for the listener from the environment, but at moderate music levels, no sound bleeds out to the environment.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
This was super cute headphones and my son loved using it. He is 6 years old and it fit his head perfectly. He thought it was comfortable and it didn't slide down.

However, after 1.5 months the headphones broke. The headphones were getting maybe used 3x a week for 10 minutes.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: My daughter tends to really go through headphones - she's rough on them. Part of the issue is she tends to fiddle with the cords when using them - twisting, bending, etc. and then she ends up losing sound quality or one speaker quits entirely. These are holding up great though! There is only one cord going to one side, with the wires to the other speaker embedded in the part that holds them on your head/ears. The cord is also thick and seemingly wraps the wires better so less likely to break. She also finds the sound quality to be very good and she's picky about that. They're also comfortable and quite cute (she has the hot pink and black ones).

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
My daughter is digging these over the ear, lightweight, foldable headphones. They have a fun range of colors and don't squeeze too tightly, which is a huge deal breaker for my 12yo. These are a great size for younger kids and tweens who are too old for big, babyish looking headphones.
PROS:
1. Ergonomic Design For Comfort
2. Excellent Noise-cancelling
3. Easy controls
CONS:
We haven't had any problems with them yet.

These are soft and comfortable and have decent sound for the price. We tried them with Android Phones and iPhones and they worked fine, though my daughter rarely uses them on phone calls. She does play her phone music through them constantly. I was given a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. I was not compensated in any other way. All opinions are my own. Recommended.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought these for my daughters iPod. She loves them. They are a great fit around her head, compact nicely to fit in a drawer, made of a sturdy material and she loves the turquoise-lavender color I ordered for her. It also comes with a built in microphone that she uses for voice memos. This was a good purchase!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these headphones for my son to use with his iPad and they are working great. These replaced a similarly priced pair of Skullcandy headphones that frequently got tangled up and did not have any controls on the line. This pair has yet to have the tangling problem after a couple weeks of constant use and the folding makes them much easier to store and transport. He has found this pair much more comfortable and they do a great job in blocking out noise around him, his mother and I included. :)

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Reviews:
I’ve had these headphones for a while and I have to break this review up into three parts. First, they look great. I got the “light blue” or “green purple” and I absolutely love the color. To be honest, I think they should fix the listing because there could be some confusion as to what color you will be receiving despite the pictures. I personally consider them to be more of a mint green color, which I expected and wanted, but others might not.

Second, they sound pretty good as well. I’m going to be honest and say that I’m not really an audiophile, so I can’t talk about the specifics when it comes to the sound. But I think they sound really good considering the price.

Third and final, they get uncomfortable for me real quick. Like within an hour. I thought it might just be my glasses so I tried wearing the headphones without them to see if that would make a difference. Not really. They still ended up being pretty uncomfortable quicker than I would have like. I would have given them five stars if not for this.

I do like these headphones, but I don’t think I will be using these much longer. Other people say that they are very comfortable for them, so I guess they just aren’t for me, which is very unfortunate because I really liked everything else about them.
