Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphones are very comfortable and look great. They appear very small due to their folding ability. On my head they are snug but not tight, and the on-ears cushioning does not make my ears hurt when worn for an extended period of time. When I have music playing in them they do a decent job of blocking out sound and I have to remove them to hear anyone trying to talk to me. Although many say they buy these for their kids, they certainly work for adults as long as you don't have a very large head. Only time will tell how the cord will hold up.

Pros:

*Comfortable
*Nice-Looking
*Folding, packs small
*Decent sound and sound-blocking

Cons:

*Cable is prone to tangling
*Probably too small for large adult heads

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Okay, to start, I really like the aesthetic design of the product, which is why I bought it. Mint green is my favorite color. The braided cord was awesome, too. However, this headphones do not have an ergonomic design. They are painful to wear. They were fairly adjustable to fit any size head, but the ear muffs were too small, and I have small ears for an adult. For instance, the Sennheiser HD 202s, its earmuff is wide and egg-shaped to fit comfortably and naturally over the ear. These have a tight grip around the ears, they're small and round, and they apply a lot of pressure on the ears. You'll be in a bad mood after wearing these for an extended period of time, and you won't know why until you realize your head is being squeezed to death, and your ears are sore. The sound wasn't too great either. It sounded muffled, and slightly distorted. I really liked these headphones, but it just didn't work out.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Unfortunately, like most moderately priced headphones, the reviews here are mostly filled with people who received the product for free through Amazon. I hardly ever review products, but this one was so different from what I was expecting, I thought it should be noted. This is the kind of product that will do in a pinch, but I definitely wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

Pros:
-The sound quality, while not fantastic, is pretty much what I would expect for headphones of this price. That is to say, not amazing but adequate.
-They fold up, making them slightly easier to carry than other bulky headphones I've had.
-The cord is covered in shoelace fabric and short, so it doesn't get tangled that often. I especially like the fact that it's short, since so many headphones come with five-foot or longer cords that always get tangled, caught up in everything and just look ridiculous.

Cons:
-The biggest one is how uncomfortable they are. I've tried to adjust them many times but no matter what, after about 30 minutes of wearing them (or less), I have to take them off because they become too painful to wear. The description stresses how comfortable they are twice, so this was definitely very disappointing. Even if everything else was perfect, this would be a dealbreaker for me.
-Though the sound quality is fine, they don't drown out outside noises at all. I wasn't exactly expecting noise-cancelling or anything like that at this price point, but they definitely do significantly worse in this category than others I've had.
-This seems to have subsided but when I first got them they had an unpleasant chemical smell.

I've only had them for a month so I can't speak for their durability, but I know my next pair will not be these.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I have used these headphones for a couple months. The sound is actually quite good. Frequency range is excellent and overall sound quality, from voice to orchestra is excellent.
The problem I have is with the comfort. After 15 to 20 minutes the spring tension holding the earpieces to the ear becomes increasingly noticeable. Some of it might be due to the angle of the earpiece which is adjustable up and down but not on the axis.
Summary - 15 minutes of use = excellent, more than that becomes barely tolerable..

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Whoa, these are some rubbish headphones. They fit uncomfortably on the head (I have a fairly small one), sound tinny, a nightmare to balance, even after an hour in equalizer - not worth the effort, plainly. Go with Sony or House of Marley for inexpensive headphones you actually enjoy.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I've had these for a few months now and use them daily.

The headphones are beautiful and are my favorite color, and I get tons of compliments wearing them to listen to podcasts at work or even from strangers as I listen to music while walking on the sidewalk. The sound quality is also good and I feel satisfied in that regard. They don't cancel noise (not something I was looking for, but if you are, take note).

Sadly though, after wearing them for about 15 minutes at a time, my ears begin to hurt and feel strained, which eventually gives me a headache if I keep wearing them. I've tried adjusting them every way possible, with the headband looser and tighter, but nothing helps. I read in some reviews that others have this issue as well. I've had other headphones similar to these in the past, and I could wear them for hours with no problem. These just feel like they push against my ears too much.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Off the top, I'll mention that I am an audio engineer; altho I didn't buy these for professional use, just for around the yard and the gym.

the sound quality is decent/good for this price range. Also good and comparable are the $15 Amazon headphones. The Amazons are ALMOST as good sounding, and far more comfortable.

The big complaint is the fit of these headphones. They fit awkwardly on my head. They don't sit "flush" with my ears. It's as though the headphones aren't wide enough on their own, and when they meet my ears, they're almost bent outwards, especially the bottom halves of the cups. I almost want to pinch or bend the bottoms of the cups inward, toward me. To get them to sit more flushly on my ears, I have to extend them to the maximum height, and that leaves plenty of space between the top of my head and the headband. I have never had this problem with other cans, so I'll say that these headphones are poorly shaped. I'd be interested to know if anyone else experiences my issues with them too. These are definitely not comfortable for that reason. The Amazon Basics are a better buy.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: cheap

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought this thinking it had volume control. I like them but I am thinking of returning them . I wanted the headphones just for listening to music while walking but that can't happen without being able to adjust the volume. Being able to skip a song is nice and the sound seems pretty good-BUT I can't believe there is no way to control the volume. It's annoying walking in the winter cold and having to pull gloves off ,unzip jacket to get at my Ipod when ever I need to make a volume adjustment. Some other review said the volume control didn't work on theirs. Am I missing something?

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought these for our 9 year old daughter so she can play Undertale and the rest of the house doesn't have to hear it! They held up well for two months. They were comfy on her ears and she loved the colors. However the padding slipped off one of the ear pieces and although I have looked and looked, I can't find a way to re-attach it. As such, they are useless now. =( Bummed.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Right now, I'm burning them in, but from first sound, I was actually pretty impressed. I have a pair of Audio Technical ATH-m50s, for true audiophile listening, and I wanted another pair for casual use. These do not disappoint! The colors are bright, which I wasn't sure of at first, but they're growing on me. They are pretty solidly constructed, better than I thought. The pads fit my ears perfectly, but let me note here that I do have small ears. They cancel noise well, just because they fit snugly. I mainly choose these because the plug in is angled. Straight plugs tend to get broken fairly quickly. Eager to see how these pan out. So far, so good!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Additionally, just wanted to make sure everyone is aware that I got these headphones at a reduced price in exchange for this unbiased and honest review of this product, and that, that has not effected this review at all. I'm brutally honest so you can trust this review is 100% truthful.

I honestly wanted to love these headphones, but the only thing holding me back from 5 stars is pretty important. These hurt my ears after about an hour. They are just too small around (the circles land on my ears and push them down); therefore, after about an hour my ears are aching. This might not be a big deal to you if you don't wear them along time or if your ears are VERY small, but I have average ears and these just hurt. I love to wear headphones for hours and listen to music while I work and I just can't do that with these without an earache and headache. If they didn't squeeze onto your head that could be prevented, but the slight "squeeze" could be a great thing if you're just using them for a quick run or something.

I'm not saying these are any different than most headphones – a lot are exactly like this size and squeeze and I've had other headphones with the same problem, it just makes not love them. I think the solution is to have some with larger circles that completely cover the ears, or have softer ear pads — these are fairly firm. Also the photo they give makes these look like the ear covers are bigger than they actually are.

QUALITY: these are actually EXCELLENT quality for the price. It's very hard to find affordable headphones that are this good of quality and even stylish. the material all over the headphones is soft and smooth with a matte appearance. The plastic is even soft and high-quality. I love that the cord has a protective rope around it! That's great because a lot of time the first thing to fail in headphones is the cord. I dont see having that problem with these. Some of the materials you can tell are slightly cheaper— but that's what you get for the price, and these do a good job of having better quality material where it's really needed.

FUNCTIONALITY: The sound is EXCELLENT in these and that's what makes be keep wanting to wear these even when my ears get sore. Even better, I love the microphone so I can use these to make calls and talk on the phone and can hear the person on the line amazingly. Another great benefit is the option to be able to adjust the ear positioning in and out based on your head size. I have a big head so that's great. Also you can fold these up pretty well as the ears fold into the center, making it great for transportation and travel. These are also VERY light. Much lighter than I expected them to be based on the photo. That could be because of cheaper material used or for better functionality — I'm not sure, but I like the lightness. I REALLY JUST WISH THE EAR COVERS WERE BIGGER / cushier.

STYLE: I think these are so cute and fashionable!!! The various colors to choose from is great. Not a fan of some of the other colors like the light "tealish" one, but these pink and black ones are perfect. I like that these have a similar design to other popular headphones.

PACKING: Awesome, professional packaging. These really do seam very expensive in every way, even the packaging was impressive for the price. They even include a warranty card with this purchase.

Any questions? Feel free to ask.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: This is a cute headset. I have a small head for an adult (I have to wear children's eyeglasses so they don't fall off my face) The earpads are cushy, but after wearing for an extended period of time, they hurt my earlobes. I love the braided cord and how they fold up. The biggest drawback of these headphones: No volume control. I prefer having a volume control on the headset.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I purchased these headphones as part of the back-to-school essentials for my daughter, as the school will be using iPads for Reading and Math, and they are terrific. The main focus of buying over-the-ear headphones as opposed to earbuds is that they are less irritating to wear for longer periods of time, and the sound is generally a better (blocks out background noise better). These headphones were able to adjust to fit her tiny head without a problem, and the padding is so comfortable that we have gotten zero complaints! This is the most important part to me, because if she is comfortable than she is learning more effectively. The sound is more important to her and my husband, and it is great through the speakers. It definitely makes you feel like you are in your own little world with these on.
The fold-able aspect of the headphones appealed to us as well, so that they can fit easily into smaller compartments of her backpack instead of the main pocket where they stand more of a chance of being smashed. Also, the cord is very sturdy and looks like it will wear very well. No cracks or broken wires to worry about here.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
When I first got it, it seemed durable and was incredibly comfortable for its price. It was working fine until today. I was taking it off and all the sudden one of the headphones fell off. In reality, It wasn't as durable as I thought it was ( I thought it would last at least 6 months with incredible care.) I only used these for during work and never took them anywhere else. Really random that it decided to break.

I would give it 5 stars, but its not that durable and only lasted a month even though I gave it really careful care and only kept it by my desk and used it there. Maybe I just got unlucky with my product.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I think these headphone would be more suitable for someone with a small head or for children. They do adjust and although I have a larger head they fit comfortably but my earlobes due hang out. I have trouble wearing earbuds due to piercings but I don't have any problem with these headphones. The ear covers are very well cushioned . I like how light weight they are. It almost feels like I am not wearing anything at all. I like to take them with me when I have to go to the doctor. I can watch a movie or listen to music without disrupting anyone else and also drown them out.
Both movies and music are crystal clear without any annoying background static that I have experienced with other head phones. I like that the cable has cloth over it to keep it from being damaged as easily. However it does not stop them from getting tangled. They work well with my laptop, kindle, and Samsung galaxy s5. They do not have a bass boost but they do still have very adequate bass for such a light weight set. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a less expensive pair for travel.
Disclaimer I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Zero noise cancellation. Person next to you can clearly hear what conversation is going on if you are on the call and using these headphones!
I am not satisfied.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Also like that it is connected to only one ear piece. My daughter seems to destroy headphones after only a week or two of use. Have only had this pair for a week but have been durable so far. Will update review after a month or sooner if something happens.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I spend my evening unwinding, usually on the internet, before I fall asleep. I don't listen to anything because I don't want to wake my husband, who has to get up very early in the morning for work. So I have started using headphones lately, I just can't use the little in the ear ones because leaning on my pillow on my side ends up pushing on them and they make my ears sore. These headphones are really cushiony so I started using them so I can listen to calming music before I sleep. Last night I put them on and within 20 minutes I was able to get sleepy enough to actually sleep. The headphone quality is really nice, I don't really need to fold them, but they fold just fine without bending on the wires. They fit on your head very nicely, go over the ear comfortably and have great sound quality. My daughter keeps wanting to snag them because they are so cute too, the pink and black make a pretty combination.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I really like these a lot. I actually have no complaints. I think for the price you pay they sound great and look really nice. The color is vibrant and beautiful and they are nicely padded for comfort. The cord it's covered in durable rope like material and is really sturdy plus they fold up to be compact. I think these are great quality for a low price, they came in a day ahead of time and I would definitely buy again.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
For the price, these headphones are amazingly good. Spent the afternoon walking around the neighborhood with them, listening to Pandora and my own MP3 files. They fit me well; though I walked while using them, they were comfortable and held nicely and may have even stayed put while jogging. The ear cups are soft and don’t press on or bother my ears. The sound quality was terrific for both voice and music.

I used them for both incoming and outgoing phone calls as well as listening to my ipod and in both cases, the sound was really clear. They also cancel out a lot of noise which would be great for plane travel. Very modern/hi-tech look. Easy folding ear cups to take up minimal space.

The headband was quite comfortable to me; adjustments were easy to make and they stayed in place without any problem. The folding design make these easy to travel with.

If you are looking for a very affordable headphone option that is comfortable to wear and provides good sound quality, we totally recommend these headphones.

Very recommended.

Go for it.

We received this item gratis from the manufacturer or seller, without obligation, and decided to objectively test and review it. My statements in this Amazon listing review reflect that testing experience.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Review Update - May 2016
This is our second pair and I'm sad to say they broke in exactly the same place (the joint of the headband to the ear piece) My daughter loves the comfort of these and I would love to get her another pair but I refuse to purchase yet a third pair for fear that the exact same thing will happen again - had to update my review and change my 5 Stars to 3stars because of this

My 9 yr old daughter loves these - says they don't hurt her ears as others have done in past - she recently broke her pair and insisted she wanted the exact same ones to replace them

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Got these headphones in sea green (with purple) for my preteen daughter. She uses them with Playstation 3, Amazon Fire Tablet, PC games, and Samsung Android phone. On Android phone calls, family members can hear her loud and clear through the built in mic (better than with speakerphone), and she can hear better (and more comfortably) than holding the phone up to her ear. For pc and PS3 games we have not tested the mic function, but she can hear music and sound effects crystal clear. (And better yet, I cannot hear them at all! Yay!)

These headphones are a dream come true! They are very comfy and soft, so she can wear them for hours (and she is very particular about comfort), plus they look good (stylish and available in her favorite colors). This is one of her favorite gifts ever...and very affordable for all the functionality. I am impressed how well they work with all her electronic devices. The microphone is built in, basically just a little hole on a piece attached to the cord, so it does not get in the way and is easy to use.

One more 'comfort' item of note that my daughter loves... the cord attaches only on one side of the headphone. Usually cords attach to the product on both sides, which leads to pulling on the neck and getting tangled. These are much more free and don't have to even lay against her neck, plus they won't get caught in purse straps or power/charging cords for other devices you use with them. She also loves the soft, silky feel of the cord and also of the entire headset. It is soft feeling on the outside of even the earpieces, and even more silky and plush on the inside. She said it feels like wearing a 'cloud' on her ears.

Also I have received good follow through and customer service from the company so far.

We have been using the headphones about a week and I highly recommend them to anyone who uses electronics frequently. If you are looking for unique colorful style, plush comfort, and versatility across a variety of devices...then these headphones would be perfect for you!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
There's a reason they only offer 3 month warranty/ the expected life is 3 months!
I purchased 2 sets of headphones. Initially out of the box I was impressed with the color and soft texture but less than 6 months later of gentle use- not even daily- neither are working correctly. On has a broken volume button with no trauma or external damage- the other only plays from one ear and when you move the wire it turns Siri on.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I recently had the need to get a couple good sets of headphones for my husband. One for him at work & one for hi here at home. He had a small crappy set that came with his phones that had completely stopped working due to issues with the connector & the wiring in them. We had gone through 3 sets of the small stick in the ear style in the last month because of how much he uses them & I wanted to upgrade to something a bit more substantial for him epically for work. He works on a farm & uses his smart phone not only to keep in touch with others on the farm when he is on the other side of the farm, or for music while working in the fields or in the shop. I picked up 2 sets for him, this set & the “AILIHEN C8 Lightweight Foldable Headphones” Bot sets are excellent if you ask me. This set (Ailihen 135) has the best fit of the 2 for him. The fit his head perfectly & create a nice solid seal around the ears providing excellent external noise reduction making them great for him at work. The sound quality is good, but I think the sound quality is actually a bit better on the other set (Ailihen C8) because of that they have become his “at home” set for gaming & streaming video. Both sets appear to be made with quality products & are working just as well as we had hoped. The color of this se (black & safety orange) make them perfect for work for him as the orange is very easy to spot. He has been using them 6 days a week for the past couple weeks now & so far we have had no issues with them at all & they have performed fantastically. As far as using them for hands free communication. They work so much better than the old ones he had & I have no issues at all being able to talk to him while he is on the tractor cutting a field.
Pros:
The noise canceling function on these & 360 degree pickup microphone with high-definition voice calls makes them great for using as a hands free device. These headphones are compatible with all Android phones, IOS, winphone and Blackberry system phones. End/Answer phone calls, Pause/Play music, support with switch of previous/next songs. These headphones fold up nicely so they are easy to take with you.
Cons:
I had noticed a few reviews with issues about the size & adjustability. Although my husband loves these & has no problem with the way they fit him, I can see how they might not be the perfect headphones for some. Every head (like every person) is unique. So although these may be great for most people. The low level of adjustability does not offer a comfortable fit to 100% of the people.
As far as I’m concerned, I would have no problems at all recommending these headphones to anyone looking for a good & portable set of high quality headphones.
I would also like to note that I received this product free or discounted in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. very cheap feeling. very poor sounding.

I had a pair of Sony MDR-V150s that broke after years of use. while ordering a replacement set, these came up as an alternative... outstanding reviews, looked good. however what arrived wasn't the same. they weren't even the same brand as pictured. the color was also "off" more like a bright orange-yellow, not a burnt orange as the picture appears. the feel was very cheap plasticy the ear pads were a sticky plastic feel... then I pugged in, and the sound was absolute garbage, tinny, weak, static-y... returned immediately.

buy Sony MDR-V150s... they are $2 more, but will give you years of quality usage. my last pair only broke because my toddler threw them to the ground... they were 6-7 years old already, and were my primary computer headphones for that time.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
While these certainly aren't the best headphones out there, they are in my opinon a really great buy. Considering they are only $20, the first great feature is their affordability. Now there are plenty of cheap headphones out there, but the problem is that most of them have poor sound quality, are uncomfortable, may irritate a part of your head or ear, not fit properly and the list can go on. While the sound quality on these certainly has room for improvement, I find the quality to be well enough for me not complain or want to put a different pair on. You can hear clearly, the sound is crisp and clear with an occasional muffled word here and there, but not enough to warrant a complaint from me or to revoke a star from its rating. I have been able to wear these for a few hours at a time before needing to give my ears a rest from them while on tv show binges. The best part is that there hardwired, which means you don't get that ever so annoying, battery low in your ear while trying to hear/listen to something, which for me, always seems to occur during a very important part of whatever I'm watching and listening to. After having used this brand myself, I have in returned purchased these in other colors for my kids to use as well.

In my opinon these are the Best Buy I've found out there as far as price to quality of sound and comfort. Really recommend these for kids, because they work well for them, but your not going to freak out if they break them because of how inexpensive they are. The fold down to making them great for traveling as well. I'm extremely happy with this initial purchase, and like I said, so much that I went ahead and purchased additional headsets for my children. I would recommend these to anyone looking at them. For the price, you just can't beat it. I did recieve these at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review of them. I was not paid or compensated in anyway to give my honest unbiased opinon, nor do I promote any one company, I simply like them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphones sound quite good and are about as noise-isolating as one can expect from on-hear headphones. The ear pads and head band are very comfortable for extended wear on my large head and have a decent range of adjustment.  THey are not for children, unless you add a pad under the head band.  They fold and store in a fairly compact package.  The microphone is a nice touch and works well, when I use them on phone calls, the other party says the sound is clear and unmuffled.  The bright colored braided cord does not tangle easily and is easy to find in a dark backpack.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphones are very soft and fit your ears well and don't hurt your ear. They have a nice length cord and are easy to use with any device. I like that they go to a decent volume and block out most of your other background noise. I had them on 25% with my computer/phone and couldn't hear my kids very easily who were watching TV in the same room. They are nice, sturdy, and heavy and easy to store when not in use.

The color is a nice teal and purple. I think these these headphones are comparable to others and I like them just as much as the expensive pair of Ludicris Soul headphones I own or any Beat products. All together I would recommend these earbuds to others because I think they are a pretty decent set of headphones - especially for kids who are hard on things.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
To begin with this is labeled as a kids set of headphones. These headphones come in an array of colors ranging from pink, blue, black, and orange to mention a few.

The sound quality is maybe average but that can be expected for an inexpensive set of headphones. The headphones do offer a full range of sound. The bass is not very distinct but it is there none the less. The sound does come through crisp and clear to about 70% of the volume before it starts to distort. If you are picking these up for a child I do not expect them to last long because almost every kid plays the music as loud as possible.

The next feature of the mic that is included. It does offer a 360 radius. I tried these out on my mumble channel. I was heard clearly by everyone in the chat. There was not reverb or crackling noises. I did have to speak up a little bit, but I am typically a soft spoken person so that is the normal for me and headset mics.

The ear pads are semi soft. The material they are made from did start to make my ear area start to sweat some. They are soft enough to be comfortable to wear for extended periods of time as well. Across the top bar of the headphones there is also a padded portion. This is a great feature for any set of headphones. It makes slipping them on/off much easier and when you bang into something it does not feel like you have ripped off the top part of your head.

If your are looking for a beginners set of headphones with a mic this is a set you might want to consider. They are inexpensive, come in an assortment of colors, and comfortable to wear for extended lengths of time. I would like to thank Sound Intone and affiliates for sending me this set of headphones to try out. Below is a link to their website where they offer a lot more products including what looks to be better headsets as well.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I LOVE the colors and appearance! Great sound distribution.

My only complaint - the ear cups/cuffs are too small. Either, at age 56, I am learning for the first time that I have big ears or these are meant for children or adults with small ears.

Seriously, after having them on for a couple of hours while I work on the computer, either the top 1/4 or bottom 1/4 of my ear is very, very sore. This makes it hard to enjoy them for any extended period of time.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I really like this headphones! I usually always buy cheap earphones because I always lose them but I bought this pair to use them with my electric violin and I am very pleased with their quality!
I guess because of the price I didn't have great expectations but the headphones are very well built, the cable is braided and it feels very resistant, they are pretty, they fit my head (I have kind of a big head), the sound is very very good! I tried the mic in a call and it works all right.
Maybe the only detail is that they are not light blue, they are mint. I don't mind because I like mint too.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought these for my 12 year old daughter for Christmas 2015, and she still uses them EVERY DAY. She loves them, but she is hard on her stuff and yet they have lasted! She did break the small piece on the side so I'll have to purchase a new set for this Christmas (even though they still work). Otherwise, I think they have a lot of life left.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I've tried several different types of inexpensive-mid range headphones and these are by far my favorite out of all the ones that I've tried. Maybe more importantly though is not that they are "better than other headphones" but rather that as that a stand-alone product they are actually really good. They are made from good quality materials and have a good sound. This is one product that I felt like actually came and looks pretty much exactly like the picture in the product description. They are designed with cushion pretty much everywhere, so your head doesn't get pinched in weird ways that make it hurt. The earpieces (earmuffs?) are comfortable and isolate the sound pretty well. Both what you're listening to from those around you as well as the ambient noise that might bother/distract you. They fold up for storage, and fold up smoothly. Like I said before, I'm impressed. I always try to think of cons and here are my biggest three:

1.) The cable isn't detachable. It's plenty long which gives you a lot of freedom but I wish it were detachable
2.) The color is super bright. I like it a lot most of the time. . . but it definitely makes you stand out which isn't always what I'm going for.
3.) The sound is good but not so good that it blows you away

Overall I really like them and assuming that they continue to work I will definitely continue to recommend them.
I was fortunate enough to be able to review these and get a discount on the price but I give them 5 stars because I am super happy with them and think that they deserve them. I definitely don't give everything 5 stars.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
My boyfriend wears this at his work. So this is more of his review than mine.

Sound quality is pretty good and the isolation pads work well, sometimes to the point where he can't hear his coworkers talking to each other (open office space).

Main issue with the pair of headphones is the pressure on the ears. Even with the comfortable ear pads. If he wears it for more than 2 hours he feels some discomfort on his ears where the headset has been sitting.

Overall, good value for the price with one downfall, could have been a 5-star otherwise.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: The fit is great. Extremely comfortable on my head. I had a problem deciphering the left and right side since I found no marking on my set as indicated in the instructions. I looked everywhere. So I chose to put them on based on how they had someone wear them in the picture - meaning the left has the cord attached. Not sure if this is right or not, but that's the best I could do. The sound a good for the price. I use it to watch videos while walking my treadmill. It really helps to drown out the sound of the treadmill. I haven't used the phone/mic part since that's not why I purchased these. Giving a four star based on the lack of labeling. Otherwise this is a very decent set.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These are BRIGHT orange! I mean bright, bright! I could see them from across the room as if they were glowing, and it is perfect! They also do fold up and store quite nicely, and they just feel sturdy!
My husband tried these out and they fit him fantastic, and had excellent sound quality. He also really liked that they include a microphone as he has been needing a new pair of headphones and microphone to use for them he is gaming, and these seem to be great for that, especially for the price.

PRO:
Soft! The headband feels like it has a memory foam insert inside of it, making it the softest pair of headphones we've ever owned. We can easily see ourselves wearing them for hours on end.
Lightweight, they feel good when wearing them but they also don't feel like junk, they feel sturdy.
Well packaged, the box they came in kept them very safe and secure.
Excellent fit, they are adjustable.
Comfortable!!

CON:
They are not 100% noise canceling, but they don't claim to be. While music/sound is playing, they do seem to function and be fairly noise cancelling, but you must have sound playing. When just on with a low volume, he could still hear I was saying something, but couldn't make out the words.
They are VERY bold and bright, which my husband loves but if you are after a more discrete set, these aren't them. There are softer color options available.

I did receive these at a slight discount to review them, but all thoughts and opinions and photographs are my own, and I was not bribed or given these for free, though wow would I have loved to have them for free! They really are fantastic.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
THESE ARE SO CUTE. I LOVE THE COLOR. ADJUSTABLE, DECENT SOUND, COMFORTABLE, AND THE CORD IS STURDY. THE FOLDABLE PART MAKES THEM A GOOD SIZE FOR A PURSE OR BOOKBAG.
THEIR BENEFITS: Ergonomic Design Make It Comfortable to Wear, with Excellent Noise-cancelling Function
Folding Design Make It Convenient to Carry.The Folding Part Have Been Tested over 20000 Times
The 360 Degree Pickup Microphone Make It Have High-definition Voice Calls
Compatiable with All Android Phones, IOS, Winphone and Blackberry System Phones. End/answer Phone Calls, Pause/play Music, Support with Switch of Previous/next Songs

SO FAR, SO GOOD. THE SOUND IS AVERAGE, BUT THAT WORKS FOR WHAT I NEEDED IT FOR.

The Use of Protein Genuine Leather Earmuff, Make It Comfortable for Long Time Wearing

SHIPPING WAS FAST AND THEY HAVE EXCELLENT COMMUNICATION. I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT AT A DISCOUNTED RATE IN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST, UNBIASED REVIEW. I AM NOT AFFILIATED WITH THE COMPANY AND THE OPINIONS EXPRESSED ARE MY OWN AND I HOPE IT HELPS. I AM THANKFUL TO HAVE BEEN GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO REVIEW THIS PRODUCT!.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: So far, so good. Small and lightweight. Not the best sound in the universe, but just fine for wearing at work when I need to drown out ambient sound. The microphone is a bonus but also very clear. These get light use and are stored at work, so not tossed around in a bag all the time.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Midtones have been flattened a bit so as to provide rich clear bass with a nice hum. However the mid to upper end range and clarity suffer slightly. My husband gives them a 5/5 because they hit the sound range that he enjoys. The color was true to image much to my delight (I love bright colors). They are surprisingly light weight while feeling sturdy and I would not worry about dropping them or tossing them in my work bag. They may not fit in small purses even in the folded up position. Large bag carriers fear not! :-)

I will report back if there are any changes, but I would purchase these again and my husband is subtly hinting at how nice the black and orange pair look.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I thought I would lay claim to these, but my 5yo and wife took them over, and I never got much chance to use them. This review is from their perspective!

Comfort: 5/5
The 5yo wore them for 2 hours straight listening to an audiobook (Ramona the Pest, if you're curious) on a long car ride. His ears were red from having 'phones on for hours, but he didn't complain about them hurting.

Controls: 5/5
So easy a 5 year old can use them. Literally. It just took one explanation, and he was able to control it easily. The headphones interfaced with the iPad (what he used them with) to watch TV and to listen to an audiobook easily.

Sound Quality: 4/5
These aren't Bose, but they're very good. I reviewed another set of headphones recently, and these are WAY better on bass; and the high end isn't tinny or flat. The midrange is good, too. I was pleasantly surprised.

Appearance: 5/5
These look pretty slick. The orange is "construction cone orange" - very bright.

Convenience/Folding: 2/5
These "fold" in, but not much. The total size is only reduced like 30%. If being able to fold headphones down to a pocket size is important to you, get something smaller and better at folding. These wouldn't even fit in a winter coat pocket.

Durability: 5/5
These were kicked around by a toddler, baby, and used every day by a preschooler. They were shoved in an over-packed car twice and made it out alive. They took a beating and were unfazed. They FEEL pretty tough, too. They stood up to high winds, sand, and wet hair at the beach pretty well. Oh, and the jack is an L-shaped jack, which is safer for your device if the headphones get yanked on. That's another huge pro for giving them to a five year old.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review. I spent a week testing them at the beach in the outer banks, just to report back on them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

These are no cheap pair of headphones but there was some serious time and thought that went into designing these just perfectly. They are foldable, which of coarse is one of the greatest features. You really need to have them foldable now and days because they will break and once that happens they are pretty much worthless. These do not have that issue at all, because they are fordable you can pretty much fit them where ever you need to without breaking or cracking them. They are very comfortable and I could wear these for extended periods of time without irritation. Disclaimer, I purchased these headphones with a promotional voucher for a fair and unbiased opinion. Everything expressed in this review is based off my experience using the product.

Reviews: Not sure yet they are wrapped up under the Xmas tree, they are going to be a gift for my 14 year old granddaughter will let you know as soon as she uses them!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I received these headphones at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. I honestly wasn't expecting very much in the line of build or sound quality, but I was very pleasantly surprised on both accounts. First of all, the accent color on these is closer to pink than the advertised purple, but I like it regardless. Also, these are "on the ear", not "surrounding the ear", but I found them to be extremely comfortable, even with my chronic daily migraines. The head band is fully padded for comfort, and the braided line is a nice feature. While these don't fully block external noises, they block them enough to where you can't hear them while listening to your own music through the headphones. The microphone is a nice feature as well. My husband used these in place of his $100 gaming headphones the other night and said they sounded really good. He said he didn't get any crazy feedback on them either. Another great feature is that these fold up for easy transport. Are they as good as Bose or Beats? No, but if you're comparing quality to price, these are the much better value.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought these for my daughter as a birthday present. I tried them after she raved about the comfort and awesome sound quality. She was right! They are great! I bought a second pair for myself!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I love the sound from these headsets. They also work well for cell phone calls. However the pins that let the speakers fold inwards broke fairly fast on the pair I got for my son. (left side first and the right side a couple weeks later) However I was able to easily drill a hole all the way through and put in a metal pin (from a paper clip) and that worked great. He is still using them and loves them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are awesome! I got a pair for my son (green and grey, his favorite colors!) He uses them with his DS and his Tablet. The foam cushion makes them comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. They adjust to fit his head (or mine if I borrow them.) The cord is plenty long enough to allow freedom of movement without getting tangled. They block out a lot of environmental noise, making it easy to hear without having to crank up the volume to a high level. Overall we are very pleased with the quality and the price!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I bought this and it came 2 days after. I bought for my kids to enjoy it. I love the color of the headphone. It is absolutely darling though I know it is for my kids use. I love that this is designed for kids because I don’t want them to use the headphone intended for adult it might cause damage to their eardrums. I love this earphone. You can have a clear, crisp, and good looking headphone for a fraction of the cost that the market out there. Headphone can cost you an arm and leg. I love my purchase. My kids love it and I love it too.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I purchase this set of headphones add a promotional discounted rate for testing and review. This is a great quality set of headphones and they sound just as good as they look. I love the color and the color you receive is very true to the color you see on your monitor when ordering from Amazon. My favorite part is that it has a built in microphone So if you're listening to music you don't have to turn off or unplug your headphones you can just answer your phone and talk straight from there. I also love that they are foldable so you can easily put them into your backpack or bag and take them with you. Another great quality on this set of headphones is that the cord is wrapped in fabric so they will not bend and cracked like cheap apple headphones. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend this set of headphones to anyone in the market for a new set of headphones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: First impression was they looked sharp for the price paid. They felt nice on the head, not too loose and not too tight. The braided cloth covered cord was a nice touch. Plugged them in and it all started to head south. I made sure the EQ on the playback device was set to flat. The headphones sounds is just incredibly dull and lifeless. I compared them to another pair of inexpensive headphones I have on hand that sell for basically they same price and the sound quality difference was simply startling.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I like these headphones. I got them on a lightning sale so for the price paid all the better. Still, I also have the Amazon Basics headphones and these have a better louder sound. I am surprised how much I appreciate the microphone and use these all the time for cell calls--here I thought the microphone was something I'd just have to "accept" with the good price and not use it. Turns out to be great feature. Now, about the manufacturer: excellent customer service. I had a problem whereby a particularly hard yank on the cord dislodged it from the headphones and they were dead. I contacted Ailihen and with just a photo sent of the damage they expedited a replacement to me. Very appreciative, very satisfied. Would definitely buy from them again.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: My daughter saw these head phones and immediately said "Can we get them????" She was SO excited when they were delivered and immediately wanted to try them. She used them for a while and then told me "Mommy! You need to leave an awesome review for these headphones!!!" So here goes! They are a very cute color - a very popular color with my 11 year old. Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These were packaged well. They fold so they aren't so bulky. The color is more a baby aqua color not baby blue. It's a gorgeous color with soft purple accents. The ear pads are very comfortable. The sound is really nice! Better than ear buds, I think. They are wired and the cord is a nice nylon braided cord. I did have a problem with one of the ear pieces stopped playing music. I fixed the cord and it hasn't happened again. I use it for phone calls which work great for that purpose too. There is a controller on the cord, but for me it is too high, I would prefer it to be further down the cord. Cord length is great. I would recommend to others.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Not pleased. :( They're really nice looking and seem well made. However, my daughter (8 yrs) finds them uncomfortable because they're too tight. They hurt her ears. No way to adjust that setting. Even in the picture, you can tell how far inward the ear pieces go.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:

The other day I used them and it was so loud I thought one of the kids had adjusted the volume on my computer, but it was only at 50%, it got me thinking, these would be great for my dad- or someone who is hard of hearing. I know my dad has a hard time finding things that will go loud enough for him to hear even on 100% volume, these would be perfect!

And they really block out all other sound really well.... great for me, but not so great when kids have them on and you're trying to get their attention! hahaha

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

In the end though, the comfort, price and durability beat out the downside.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Let me start off by saying these are probably the cutest pair of headphones I have ever owned. The color is lovely and vibrant! I went with the light blue and I'm sure glad I did. I can assure you you'll definitely get loads of compliments if you're out wearing them.

Not only are they really cute but the sounds quality, at least from my experience, is great! They sound clear and there's no muddy sound and I'm very happy that the bass doesn't eat up the mids and trebles as a lot of the time that's even an issue with pricey headphones.

They are definitely of good quality and fit quite comfortably (on me, they run a bit small on my husband - so fit /will/ depend on person wearing). And you can pretty much carry these anywhere as they are quite compact. Definitely a great pair of headphones that are worth your buck.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: We bought two of these for our kids to listen to their Leap Reader pens in the car without driving each other or us crazy. They are perfect! I love that they can fold up to be stored somewhere smaller, and the cord is very long, and covered with paracord – type material so they can't chew through the plastic like they did their old ones. They seem like they will be able to hold up to kid – use. We will likely be buying more for their little brother and possibly even for us!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I have a VERY destructive toddler but these headphones have withstood the test of time! They are padded and so bendable that it makes them very difficult to break, The cord also has a rope material that would make it hard to split, tear, or break. The volume is limited, which is great for small children, but not so much so that they would have difficulty hearing (I've had that problem with other children's headphones). They also adjust to fit an older child or adult head comfortably.

The only complaint I have is that the foam padding on the ear piece does come off when pulled on, which is probably expected. It took me a few tries to get it back on properly but I have no issues with it now.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Reviews:
WARNING!! DONT BUY

The jack cap came off after i was trying to take the headphones out of my phone. the sound was permanently broken (because my phone still thought headphones were in) there was no way to fix it. i ended up having to buy a new iphone. the same thing also happened to my brother, who had to replace his ipad. unless you have warranty on your products, they refuse to replace the device, because the headphones aren't apple products, so we both had to pay full price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I bought this for my 12 year old daughter and she loves it! You can hear the music/audio clearly and someone else can't really hear the audio you are listening to when you are using the headphones. She actually has a pretty big head and it fits her perfectly. It also fits her mother and sister very well too.
Although, one bad thing, is that when you are in a call with someone, they can't hear you when you are speaking into the mic (of the headphones).
There is also a button on the mic, which I don't know what it is for, and it seems that it's only use is to end the call.
But overall, it is pretty good for an item that is less than $20.
(By the way, the product says it is Light Blue, but it is actually like an aqua green with a hint of light blue.)

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I can only listen to so much Dan TDM on youtube before I want to gouge my ears out, so I've been looking for an iPad compatible headset for my son. He's five, and these fit perfectly. They didn't slip off, even when he took a short youtube break to headbutt our cat. They fold up to a really compact size, so they can fit in my purse to carry around when we go places. And they look pretty cute on him. The pastel colors are a lot less jarring next to his tiny features than the black headphones you normally see. He said the sound was great. Two thumbs up.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
This lightweight and foldable head phone has stylish design and reflect-able pain/color in it which is great for walking at night. The headphones is very well made, the band can be adjust according to your head size and it fits nicely and comfortably on my head. The earpieces are super cushioning, which help eliminate noises and also bring great quality sound. The cord is cover by canvas fabric, which increase the flexibility, and durability. The sound quality is great, both bass and treble blend nicely together which bring great depth to the sound.
I am really like it and would definitely recommend it to friends and family.
I got this Lightweight foldable headphones at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Although the headphones look stylish, they aren't as comfortable as I thought they would be. I'm a teenager with a relatively small head but no matter now much I adjusted the headphones, they were too tight. The cushions on the headband and over the ear parts help, but they still pushed painfully on my ears and temples. I thought that this may have been caused by my glasses, but after testing this, I found this was not the case. Additionally, their folding ability was a bit underwhelming since the part that covers your ears was the only piece that folded, so the size wasn't really changed when doing this.

On the other hand, the sound quality is very clear and the volume is perfect. However, the remote on the cord caused the audio to pause and play at random times; this is very annoying and difficult to fix. Even with the remote, the cord was impressive due to its thick, braided exterior and I'd be surprised if it broke anytime soon. The headphones were very durable with bright and attractive colors. I would recommend getting these headphones for a child rather than a teen or adult.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Well, they still work or i would give them one star. Very cute, comfortable, great sound... but who ever designed these didn't think through long term wear... the pads eventually come off! And they are VERY difficult to put back on, and stay on ONLY if they are treated like a baby bird. The second they get bumped they fall off again! I'm going to try gluing them tomorrow... we'll see how it goes.
Boo.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:

The mic's a standard headphone mic and the buttons on the cord only control pause and play without the colume buttons. Not a huge draw back but there's room for improvement. Chord seems pretty sturdy and durable. The headphone jack is made so that the ends of the chord dont snap eventually as a lot of headphones do. Overall an excellent buy

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

As a side note, regular gaming headsets are borderline too big on me, I always have to set them to the tightest fit.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: We bought this for our kids to use with their iPads on long trips. The ear covers are a soft plastic material, which makes it easy to wipe with sanitizer. The jack fits both an iPad mini and a regular iPad. It folds and is adjustable, which is very cool, especially for storing in a desk or schoolbag. What surprised us was the sound quality, though--as good as the brand names we all know and love, but for way less cost. The cord is covered with a braided cloth, which is nice for kids--less chance of nicks. A very light headset, which is good for kids also. We found that heavier earphones make his neck hurt after a while. But with this sound quality, adjustable sizing, and long cord, we've been using it too. Another nice feature is that the plastic/rubber is thick, with quality hinges that allow them to collapse down easily. We Will probably pick up a few more in the future.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I like these headphones a lot, mostly I like that they are able to be folded up so you can store them easily in your bag. The ear covers are very soft and mold great to my ears. They are very comfortable to wear. The sound is great and it is very easy to use the microphone. All you have to do is press the button and there you go! They are adjustable on each side too so you can get the right fit for your Skull!!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Got these for my 8 year old son. Good enough for him, sound quality was ok, but didn't do much to cancel out outside noise. Got them for a trip that we took and he was able to use them on the airplane and the fit was good. I also used them, and they fit my adult head as well.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these headphones because they were on sale during a lightning deal, and because they matched my computer. For 13 bucks, I didn't expect them to be anything special. After opening them and using them a little, they are about as underwhelming as I expected. They are an on-ear style, fairly light weight, and fairly comfortable for on-ear headphones. The cups are very stiff however, and do not bend or adjust easily. The cord is a nice braided fabric and is actually quite long, longer than I expected which is a plus for me. The sound quality these put out is fairly average. Highs are quite good but mids are very muddy. Bass is average, and anyone who loves low bassy cans will be disappointed with these. Overall, with these headphones, you get your money's worth, but there are better headphones out there for around the same price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: It looks good. This one replaces another similar model head phone from the same company. I am hoping that this will last longer than the other AILIHEN headset that I got for my son. On the old one, one side when bad without any noticeable damage to it.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I really liked these headphones. The foam is very comfortable around the ears. The cord has a "shoelace" feel so it's so much sturdier than the plastic covered wired ones my family and I are use too.
The color is vibrant! It's a beautiful color to see when the normal black can be tiresome.
The sound is amazing! This is our new favorite pair!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
This is the second pair of headphones which I have ordered from this company, and once again, I am not let down! Although this is not a brand that I recognize from the USA, judging by the quality and craftsmanship of the headphones themselves as well as how nicely it is packaged, I am willing to bet that this is a premium brand elsewhere. Just very very nice!
One of my favorite features of these headphones is the wiring. It almost looks like a nylon shoelace, very different from the typical rubber covered wiring on many other brands. This is a major plus to me because my terror of a cat is not remotely interested in chewing this wire up like he is the rubber type. This is also beneficial to the longevity of the cord as fraying and tearing have yet to be an issue that I've encountered.

This unit is heavily padded on both the ear muffs as well as the headband. This allows for ample comfortable listening time for Peppa Pig movies and Bubble Guppies as well, as the songs on there drive me mad and I'd rather not hear them. My daughter however absolutely LOVES them. Okay, I'm swaying from course, but you get the point, these are COMFORTABLE! And although I purchased them for my preschool aged daughter, I too have used them and can vouch for their comfort and performance.

I ordered the light blue and purple color variety, and it was very true to the color that you see on screen. The colors are extremely vibrant and make this a super stylish headset!

This unit folds in at the ears. This makes them instantly portable and compact! It also makes it easier to preserve the life of these headphones as when they are folded inwards, the earmuffs are protected and there is less of a chance of them getting snapped in half. (This has actually happened with a previous brand that I purchased). The hinges are thick and well made and I do not see them breaking anytime soon.

All of that is almost enough to make me purchase these, but the real test comes when you give them a listen. How do they sound you ask? I can honestly say that these sound excellent!! I compared them to my husbands high dollar headphone set and the sound quality of these was right up there with his! I was very impressed with the stereo surround sound quality. I was able to hear things that were going on from all different points in the show that I was watching. It really brought the show to life for me! And music...oh music!! I am able to hear every instrument clearly and distinctively. I truly am impressed as the price of these is phenomenal and was not expecting them to be THIS great!! I love them, my daughter loves them and my bank account didn't suffer.

I honestly can not think of a single complaint at this time for these headphones, but should any issues ever arise, I will update my review to reflect that. I would recommend this product. Five Stars from me!

Discounted for evaluation

Update: After not even a year these headphones broke. The right earpiece broke off from the headphones. I was actually happy though because these were the most uncomfortable headphones I ever had the displeasure of owning. Even after constant use for months they stayed very tight on my head. I have a rather small head as well. I couldn't wear my glasses and headphones at the same time because the headphones just caused my glasses to dig into my head. They were awful. Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
It's not really a secret that I'm not a fan of going to sleep. I LOVE to sleep, but I alway hate actually going to sleep. I do enjoy laying in bed, though. I'm a night owl, sadly my MR is not, so I watch movies at night with my iPhone ear buds while he snores away next to me. We don't get along though, those earbuds and I. They tend to hurt my ears after a movie, but I thought I had no better options. My earlobes are gauged to a 1/2 inch, and I wear double flared tunnels most of the time. When I wear over the ear headphones, they tend to push my tunnels into my head, and it hurts. I was given the Ailihen I35* headphones free to review, and I was excited but also wary. I was worried they were going to push my ears like everything else I have tried. Still, I was willing to give them a shot. If they sucked less than the earbuds, it'd be a step up.

They were delivered rather quickly, and the first thing I noticed about them was the color. Now, I know what color I was getting, but I wasn't expecting just how pretty it was in person. It's a poppy aqua blue with a light purple on the underside and covering the speakers. There is a light purple line around the headphones as well. (Bonus, the blue matches my favorite pair of Converse!) It's wrapped in soft leather, giving it a very comfortable cushy feeling on your head. They're not too tight so no head squeezing is going on. even with my mass of hair. The ear pieces are extendable by a little to fit all sizes of heads. They fit my tiny head as well as MR's large noggin.The sound is crystal clear, but can't be heard outside the headphones, so I didn't have to worry about disturbing the MR while he was sleeping and I was up all night watching horror movies cursing my insomnia. He couldn't hear any screaming or chainsaws or people being sucked into hell, and I had all that stuff pretty loud. I could barely hear his {VERY LOUD} snoring over even the lowest parts, so it drowns out sound just as well as it keeps sounds in. I love how they fold up, so it will be easy to throw them in my purse and take them with me on long road trips. There's a little plastic piece on the cord that houses a mic and a PLAY/PAUSE /END CALL button. The mic picks up sound clearly and the button is very useful when I don't want to take my phone out of my pocket to stop a song on pandora. Overall, I'm incredibly impressed and happy with these. If you're looking for good headphones at a great price, you should check out the Ailihen I35. They come in 5 great colors so there's options for everyone.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I've had this for a year and used them for much less than that. Sound quality is great for the price. Cord is overly long and gets caught on things all the time making it inconvenient. Also, recently it has started skipping and stopping songs without me pressing the remote. Devices also have started thinking the headphones have been unplugged even though it is still in the jack. This has resulted in calls being dropped and a lot of notifications from my computer as it goes back and forth thinking the headphones are in or out. In general, the headphones are fairly comfortable. I wear glasses and often the headphones dig the arm of my glasses into the side of my head, but that's probably standard for over-ear headphones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Pros: These headphones look great! For the price you pay no one would guess they were "bargain" headphones. The color is very vibrant and true to the photo on the website. The ear cushions are very soft and comfortable even after extended use. I especially like the cord of the headphones because they're more like a string material than your standard plastic cord; this makes for a much more durable cord.

Cons: Unfortunately, the sound quality is lacking. It's not bad sound,but it's not really good either. The bass is especially disappointing; it's more of a muddy sound than anything else.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I've had these headphones for about a month now and they are pretty spectacular. I love the color so much. I got the minty purple one. The cord is so long too, much loner than a standard headphone cord. It also has a button I can use to change songs or pause and play songs, it does not adjust volume though. It also has a built in mic but I haven't used the mic yet so I don't know how well it works. It's very sturdy and comfy to wear. Oh and it's adjustable. It's a great purchase for good quality headphones at such a low price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
These headphones quit working sporadically on the right side within a couple months. I wish I would have known about the "free/cheap product in exchange for positive review" phenomenon that is happening on Amazon before I purchased these. The sound is average, "good-enough" quality but the fact that sometimes I only get sound on one side makes them almost worthless to me now. I even used dollar-store earbuds instead of these until I got my Hesh 2 headphones, which are wonderful by the way.

*Note: If you see a product with great reviews and a lot of them, check to see if there are a lot of customer photos (it seems like this is something the review buyers either request or require of their reviewers when they give them free or reduced-cost products). If it's something you haven't heard of much or at all outside of Amazon, the good reviews are probably "paid" and I would recommend staying away. Sometimes the reviews will also say that the reviewer received the item in exchange for the review. Amazon used to be a place I trusted for consumer opinions; sadly, this is not the case anymore.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I tried these on my sons NABI2 and in the Headphone Jack of my Tahoe. The sound quality is fresh and clear.

The cord is made of braided nylon. Similar to paracord material. They dont get tangled or knotted up. The cord is permanently attached to the ear piece. So with kids, it wont come out. Which can be a hassle if there is a really great Alivin and the Chipmunks tune blaring and the cord comes undone then so does your kid.... OMG! lol.

The ear pieces are adjustable by moving up and down to adjust for head height. So these fit my 3 year olds head and my adult head. Which is a nice attribute to have. You can see them adjust in the video as welll.

Hopefully the video helps your purchase decision. Because even tho I got a discount, this is a really nice set.
*received a discount for my review and experience with this product.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Bought these when my old headphones failed on me. These are gorgeous, just as pictured, and really channel out sounds; I can usually hear others in the room talking even with my headphones but it totally blocked out those trying to get my attention and I don't blast my music to unreasonable levels! Had them for a week, mind, but so far so good.

UPDATE:
Despite their prettiness, these headphones broke on me within weeks. Twice! The seller was kind enough to replace the first one and quickly and I was even more gentle than I was before in case I was too rough. Didn't make a different because it broke again within the same time span.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
We just took a long road trip from Kentucky to Florida and back. We had found some portable DVD players at a yard sale and we needed head phone for my daughter. These were perfect and very comfortable. It made our trip a lot better because she could watch movies without bothering her brother.

If you or your child needs nice set of head phone, make sure you check out the Ailihen I35 Stereo Lightweight Foldable Headphones. They are just what you need! They are available in several colors.

The only issue we had was that the ear pad came off but you can pop off the little piece and easily put it back on.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
For the price ($20 when I bought it) I was just looking for some cheap, cute, comfortable over-ear headphones. I was sick of using my earbuds at home. I saw these and figured I'd trust the reviews. They are definitely not the highest end but the physical quality holds up. I've dropped them a few times and they work fine.
The size adjustment is great, the cushions on the ear cups are soft, and the fabric cord is a nice touch.
I do agree with some people that they do get a little uncomfortable after wearing for about 40 minutes or more. I usually have to take a minute break and remove them.
Also, I do a lot of listening with only one cup on my ear and there doesn't seem to be any bad stress on the headband itself from going behind one ear and staying on the other. And when that one ear gets uncomfortable, I switch ears.
The sound is decent, what you should expect with these priced phones. The bass isn't nearly as good as I wish they were, but the highs are pretty decent. Crisp quality for the most part, some static when I crank the volume and play songs with big highs/lows. Good for casual listening, not recommended for analyzing in any sort of professional manner.
There is a lot of sound leaking despite creating a tiny vacuum between your ears and the speakers. They are loud enough to hear from a while away, so keep that in mind when you consider what you will be listening to.
On the fabric/braided cord, it has a dongle to pause/change songs, and there is a mic which I've only been able to get working on my Ps4 (yes it can be used as a headset, which is great!). The cord itself, despite being braided, kind of tangles still so that's also a downside.

I've attached a few pics and a video of the sound leak.

Overall they are great for the price and do what they're meant to; Cheap and easy to use.
I'll post again if something happens.

EDIT 03: My second pair, and just like the first, one ear went blank. Still never even left my house with the headphones; they were always plugged into my computer, yet somehow one ear goes out AGAIN. Kinda frustrating, but they are lower priced and thus you get what you pay for. Good for a good time, but not a permanent staple in your audio arsenal. :(
