Good quality, comfortable fit and most importantly, the speaker quality is on point. Some headphones are hard to hear through even when the volume is cranked and others blast the sound even when the volume is low. In the words of Goldilocks, these headphones are "just right."

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Surprisingly good manufacturing and sound quality! Soft braided headphone cord should hold up a bit better than coated wire, too! Bought them for my 4yo who has never worn headphones or earphones...she instantly loved them. Down-side (or UP-side, if you will) is that they filter out sound so well that she (with the volume set to about 1/2 way on her Kindle) didn't hear my wife come home, slam the door 10ft away, and walk up to her asking her how her day was. This is a girl who will run from a whole different part of the house to greet her mama! Will probably buy a second pair for my 8yo. *Side note: Not comfortable for adult wear!*

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these for my daughter and she loves them! The purple and pink is bright and fun, and the sound quality is good. I bought these for her kindy class, headphones were on the supply list, as much as she loves them we will probably need a pair for home too.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I've now bought two sets of these headphones and overall would buy a third.
Pros: The headphones are pretty cheap and super cute. The material is nice and soft and it doesn't hurt my ears to wear unless I've been wearing them all day long. The sound quality is good enough for me, though I'm no expert on these sorts of things. Better sound clarity and quality than $20 earbuds.

Cons: The first pair didn't last very long. About maybe 4 months in, the left ear's hinge (the one that allows it to fold off) snapped very suddenly and rendered my headphones unwearable. A quick, thrifty repair job later allowed them to be worn for another 5 months or so before the plastic holding my repair job became too stressed and gave way. I obviously liked them enough to buy a second pair, but I can't give the item 5 stars for this issue, which other reviewers have also reported on. Overall though, I can't complain too much for the price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: So I was little skeptical ! but then wanted to try this one.The quality is really good for the price.The finishing is impressive because for the price I was expecting kind of uneven finish.It looks neat! The best part for me is the cord it looks like a thread which is cool! and has longer length.The button works fine ! fits in the audio jack of iphone/ipad perfectly! I will come back on the usage wearing.Update coming soon !

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: We really liked these headphones for the handful of times my daughter used them. However, yesterday, after owning them for just a few months, and my daughter using them gently for no more than five times, the ear pad detached from the headphone itself. There doesn't appear to be a way to put the ear pad back in, or reattach it to the headphones itself.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Bought this headphone for my cousin as a little gift for school because one of her classes required her to have one. Ordered this mostly because it looks pretty nice and she liked pink color. However, when I visited her last time and actually tried to see how's the sound quality and I was quite disappointed because the sound is too sharp especially considering this is for little kids. I don't expect very high quality for this price but definitely not something this sharp and loud. Do your kids a favor, get some higher quality ones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these headphones based on the reviews of good noise canceling - in fact there is zero noise canceling with these headphones, I could very clearly hear background noises, far too loud. The vendor did an easy return, about the only positive thing I can say about this purchase.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Admittedly, I beat the hell out of my headphones by listening to music that's not only loud, but also tends to feature a lot of distorted guitar, and heavy bass. My last set was an inexpensive Sony one that managed to last 3 years-a record for me. In fact, the only reason I retired them was because the faux leather on the earpieces was flaking off and going everywhere.
After reading the good reviews, I decided to give these a try. While the sound is not quite as crisp and clear, nor are they quite as loud as my Sony ones, they are quite good, and a great value for the price. I like the single cord, and the fold up design too. All in all, I'm quite happy with these...now it's just a matter of seeing how long they can keep up with me, lol!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Awesome headphones for my kids. I noticed that I had ordered a pair of these a while ago for my daughter. Definitely worth the purchase.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These earphones are wonderful, but I didn't realize that they are for kids! I wish they had a volume control as I have a hearing problem and there is no way I can raise the sound. But they are so soft and comfortable.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Wow! These are super nice. The company accidentally send them to the wrong address but caught it and corrected the problem before I knew there even was one and it got here two weeks before I expected it to! Cord is strong and has a casing over it, and the headphones are great! Nicer than I expected

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These were just what I was looking for. My grandson uses these often with his iPad and they are great. I would definitely buy these again

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

They have good sound quality (from what I can tell), are comfortable, durable, and they stay on while jogging. Best of all - they are affordable too! These headphones are great!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I have bought 3 pairs of these headphones in different colors for all of my daughters. Ages 4, 6 and 9. They fit perfectly, lightweight and they love them! I will buy them again once they wear out. Highly recommend. Great product at a great price.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I got these as a gift for my 11 year old daughter. She loves them and takes them every where with her.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

So far holding pretty good despite of the abuse. She loves how they fold so they fit nicely on her little purse. The color matches her phone case, my luck because i didn't realize that was the case.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Sturdy headphones, decent sound quality (especially for the price), fold up neatly, nicely padded headband, the woven cover on the cable was unexpected but adds to the overall feeling of quality. Thinking about buying another set in green for my kiddo.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I use these for everything! To include talking on the phone during my walks. They truly do the JOB!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: the sound is great, but you cant wear them for too long because they clamp down on your ears too tight. bought them in august and now its december and the bit the connects into the computer came off. very dissapointed, was hoping it would last at least a year.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Disclosure: I did receive these at a discount (not free) to review them, but all thoughts and opinions and photographs are my own.
I was immediately drawn to these because I knew my 9 year old daughter would LOVE the colors, and she does. She was so excited to get her own pair of over the ear headphones because she says that sometimes her ears get sore from using the ear buds that she has for school (which they need them to be buds because of space/storage issues) but not at home. She likes that they have very soft ear muffs and she likes that they have noise cancelling features so she can do her thing on her tablet without hearing her brother on his tablet (mom on the other hand has had to learn that she may not hear me if she is wearing them). It does have the ability to pause/play music or answer/end calls but she hasn't had a need to figure that out yet. She said she also likes that the headband part is adjustable.
Even though space is not an issue, I like that these fold up nicely as you can see in the picture because it makes them more compact for when we are traveling.
I really like that the cord is covered with a braided fabric so that they can stand up to any abuse that a child does to it by twisting and wrapping and not break like has happened with plastic cords.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Most of the time only one side works. They were a waste of money and I now have to buy another set of headphones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: They work great with my iPhone and they look great as well. No issues with sound quality and they fold up which is nice. I only gave them a 4 because they are pretty snug on my ears and if I'm wearing earrings they press the earrings into my head which can hurt a bit. Take your earrings off and enjoy these great headphones

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: my son loves these head phones! I ordered a pair for my daughter as well only the pink and back and she loves hers just as much. they never complain that their ears hurt or that they are uncomfortable!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
This is my second time buying these headphones as my first pair was taken from me ( from a family member who fell in love with them). So I decided to buy another pair so I could have my own headphones again.

The first thing you will notice about these headphones versus others of similar price points, is that these ones can be folded in. Personally, I can take or leave this feature.

Next, is They are more comfortable than some I have bought in the past. This feature I love!!! Extra padding = less pain. Always a plus.

I know that in the advert, these are show cased as being more for kids, but they fit my head just fine and my husband's as well. And why should the kids get all the fun?

The sound quality is okay. Not bad but not the best out there either. However, for around twenty bucks, I am not going to complain since it gets the job done.

Another cool feature is the optional mic. You can turn it on or off by pushing a little button that's located on the wire. And it's compatible with my phone so I like it.

Last but certainly not least is the color. I got the hot pink ones. Love the color!!!

Obviously I like these headphones since this is my second time purchasing them. For the price I think you can't go wrong. Only downside I can see with these that may pose an issue is when you go to adjust them, you have to pull on them to lengthen them and when you do this they feel a bit stiff and make a clicking noise, which I think might be Normal for this type of phones. .

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these for my 11 year old daughter. The color is really nice and she absolutely loves them! She uses them on a daily basis for long periods of time. We've had them for 3-4 months and they already have a short in them where only one side has sound coming out of it. She still loves them though and hasn't complained. So a 3 star review for the awesome headphones that lasted 3-4 months.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are comfortable headphones that fit well over the ear to block out external sounds. I have enjoyed using these headphones with mic during conference calls I have taken on both my cell phone and computer. It also fits my 5 year old child very well when using a tablet traveling. I have not found any issues with the quality. The color pops and I have received compliments on it. I would buy these headphones again in the future if needed.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Great sound, very comfortable, stylish. I've had mine for at least six months now, and they work perfectly. The bass could be a little deeper I suppose, but for the money, I really shouldn't complain. People compliment me on how stylish they look too!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Very comfortable and they stay put on my smallish adult head without slipping. They are not noise canceling, but they do help block out a lot more outside noise than my other headphones, especially if I'm playing more aggressive music.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Got these for my daughter to use at school. They survived kindergarten and have made it through 1st grade as well and they are still working. The nylon wrapped cord has really held up.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Fabulous product! Bought for my Father, and then again for my Uncle. They are able to listen, and background noise does not bother them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

The only downfalls that I found were the following; the cord is a cloth fabric, which will in result lead to being very dirty if you purchase this item for a young child (I bought for my 8 year old) and I find they fit around the ears a little too tight to feel a little uncomfortable for my preference. Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

She has been using them for over a month and they have withstood the daily abuse of going into her locker and back into her backpack. They look great and do not show any wear and sound just as good as when I purchased them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I got these for my daughter. She loves them. The thing I like is that the cord is wrapped in cloth, so I expect they'll last longer than all the others we've gone through.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Purchased for my teenage daughter. She loves it. Very comfort ear pad, great quality, clear sound, foldable design. Almost no sound leak.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I use these headphones to listen to my computer. Good sound, good quality, comfortable to wear, fit adults.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Despite not being a name brand easily recognized, I've gotten many compliments on these headphones.

On a comfort level, they settle well and have plenty of adjustment available. The color options are fun too, I chose Orange because that's my university's color. The sound is clear and not subpar.

If you want an alternative to ear buds, and just want to listen to your media in private, these will do the trick. At higher volumes, it's less private, and people can usually hear a mumble of what you're listening to.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
They are VERY small. I think I have a pretty average-sized head, but they can get a little too tight feeling after a while. Think they are slowly stretching out to fit my head a bit so that they're just "snug."

They sound fine. It's nothing to write home about, but that's what you should expect from this price point.

For the money, they're fine. But be aware that they really are just going to be too small for probably most people.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I've had these headphones for a few weeks now and I like them a lot! The colors are so pretty, the sound is good, and the cord is wrapped in some kind of fabric so it never tangles. It's a little too early to tell if they'll be long lasting but you can't beat the price! To me it's not worth it to buy $200 headphones so these are perfect for now.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
A few months back I left a pretty scathing review of this headset. In those few months I have now racked up 40k miles flying with them and can now give an update on how they are doing.

First, they still look cool and the cloth cord does keep it from tangling. I like that. I've been folding it up after every use and haven't seen any wear on them. As far as the audio is concerned the scratchiness and tininess that was on my computer I have not experienced that on my ipad or phone. The mic has also remained clear and crisp. That's one thing I hadn't had a chance to try out before. Now, I still think the headset is made for smaller ears but I found out the hard way that I really can't walk the street with them on as I had a hard time hearing the traffic.

Lastly, the pain that I mentioned from wearing them too long has also subsided. Either I got use to them or they stretched just a bit. I can wear them now for an 8 hr plane ride and not have to remove them. In fact, I even turned down the Bose headset on my flight back from Auckland because I felt these were doing a really great job in relation to the noise cancelling Bose ones.

They look nice and the cloth cord is cool. That would be where the pros stop for me.

Not even 5 hours in and I already have a tininess and scratchy audio from left ear. The headset is also essentially too small for my ears. I get 10 minutes of usage before my ears begin to hurt.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Came quickly and is what I wanted. A little tight but for me that is ok because it stays on. It was purchased for an adult.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: From the reviews I expected these to be decent headphones, but I didn't realize how nice the sound would be! Also, I didn't see it mentioned, but that little button on the cord is a pause button. I don't know how it works, but it works both with my mp3 player and with the YouTube app on my phone. I definitely recommend these.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Nice set of headphones I purchased for work. Sound is clear, I just wish the cord was a little longer.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are very well made, and have good sound quality. They also block out most outside noise. But if you are a glasses wearer they may cause a bit of pinching on your ears if worn for a long period of time.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: Purchased this for our youngest son who love these headphones. The colors are very bright which is great! The sound is clear and the ability to extend them if needed is also a plus. They are not noise cancelling so we make sure that he keeps them at a safe level for his hearing. Which thankfully with these headphones is still loud enough to hear and enjoy what's going on, but quiet enough not to bust out his ear drums. Be careful, you could get lost listening to your preferred genre and get caught singing off key out loud as though you were home in the shower (I went ahead and tested them out at high level to see how they are...I love them. My oldest son decided to feed me a cracker when I hit the high note...brought me back to reality). :-)

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones are very comfortable, for long term use. I use mine at work mainly, and leave them on for hours at a time. The sound is excellent, and is very clear. I have only had mine a few weeks so I don't know how long they will hold up, but they seem very well made. The cord is a bit thicker than some headphones, and long enough for deep pockets. I am thinking of getting a second pair for home use.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These are the first headphones I've ever owned that actually fit my obnoxiously tiny head (I wear child-sized hats). Music sounds great through these, and they've also worked well on phone calls. The mic pics everything up perfectly, and my family claims they could hear me better through the mic on these than on my old apple earbuds. I've also got 5 piercings per ear, so I usually don't bother with full headphones, but these are surprisingly comfy! I also appreciate that they come in adorable pastels.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones are pretty decent for the price. My package arrived on time, and in a secure box. They are made surprisingly well, and are pretty sturdy. I ordered the pastel blue and pastel purple set, and the color is very pretty in person. The cord is made out of cloth, which I can definitely appreciate for its durability. The sound quality is pretty decent, and I don't think you can get much better for the price. Overall, I would definitely recommend these headphones for someone who is looking for a decent set on a budget. These headphones are also great for kids, because they are adjustable.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Bought for my (adult) daughter. She claims they are very comfortable and sound clear. Looks like a good purchase, good price.

Update as of July 2017: One side died after only 6 months of use. Daughter was disappointed, and the return-by date was past due. Ailihen customer service to the rescue...after a couple of emails with troubleshooting questions, they had a new pair delivered within a week. Super friendly email exchanges...very impressed.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: We bought these as a Christmas gift. About a month after our daughter started using them, the sound went out in 1 ear. She is very gentle with them and it was not because of damage on her part. I just missed the return window through Amazon, so I contacted the seller directly. Even though there was a slight language barrier, they provided me with some troubleshooting tips. When those all failed, they quickly sent out a replacement. We are hoping this new pair doesn't quit on us again, but I'm giving this product 5 stars because of their commitment to customer satisfaction. Our daughter loves these headphones. They are the perfect size for a child.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Surprised that these are noise canceling I was nervous about buying a fold up headphone set, I've always felt fold ups would be a weak poin, however so far so good I have not had any problems with the connection from folding and unfolding.
I've read some reviews that say tnese headsets are uncomfortable on your ears after wearing them for half an hour, I feel most headsets are that way until you get used to them I started wearing mine for short periods of time and as time went on they felt fine. The price is great! The only thing that could have made these better would have been if I but hey you get what you pay for and I'm very happy with what I paid for!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Wow, very impressed! I didn't expect a lot from the low price, but I'm quite pleased with this purchase. The sound quality is like surround sound in your ear! Also, they aren't labeled as noise-cancelling, and I'm not an expert, but when I wear these most other noises are unheard (someone has to tap me to make me aware they need my attention).

The headband is very comfortable and so is the ear muff cushion. The size adjusts to fit all the kids, my husband, and me.

On a side note, I really like the color options offered. I got the gray/green to suit our whole family. The cord is covered in a woven flexible material that I really like as well -- reduces the digital-age feel just enough to make these seem upscale.

I use them in my Kindle, desktop PC, and iPhone -- all work well.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I absolutely loved these headphones when I saw them! The colors were vibrant and pretty. Here's the clincher: The VERY first time I put them on, the sound bounced back from one side of the headphones to the other-one side had sound and the other didn't. There was also a lot of static and my music sounded terrible. The cord seemed very sturdy, and intact, and I loved how it was covered. BUT the static was terrible. I didn't give it one star because I really did like the overall appearance. Definite disappointment.

Update: Okay...my son used these and say he had no problem hearing with them, and both sides worked. I have since tried them, and they seem to be working fine now. I must admit that I am a bit leary and fear they will start going out again. At this moment I am willing to upgrade from 2 to 4 stars with high hopes that they continue working properly.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought these for my husband he loves them! I had bought him head phones from Bose and they only lasted a year and a half even though the sound was good they were too expensive to have broken down that quickly, so I decided to try these head phones which are priced really low and wasn't sure if they would be of any quality . I was pleasantly surprised to find out they work fine and the sound is very good. Thank you

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
UPDATE 10/22/16 The seller sent me a replacement (see below) and I have been using. I am updating to 5 Stars. Four stars for the headphones and an extra because the seller promptly took care of my issue when one side of the headphone stopped working. These are pretty good for the price. My teams color and I use them primarily to listen to game on radio while at the stadium. I am impressed because the seller did not have to send a replacement. I have had other headphones stop working (who hasn't ) and those sellers did not care. Thank you Ailihen!

I was liking these and after a couple months the left ear stopped working. I don't think the right ear will keep working much longer either. Additionally the part where you plug into device got bent without anything really happening to make it so. I am back online looking for another headphone in anticipation of this one not working entirely.

The colors are great!

(UPDATE 10/17/2016-The seller was kind enough to contact me and offer a replacement or refund. I replied that a replacement would be good. After I receive and use for a few weeks, I will update the headphone review. As stated above, I really liked but one side stopped working a short time after receiving. In picture the side that does not have wire going into the headphone went silent)

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Wow! These are terrific! I prefer to use a headset whenever I use my cell phone as it frees up my hands and keeps the blood flowing! I've previously used over-the-head headsets with a mic protruding but the volume just wasn't adequate so stepped up to this headset. Wow! What a change! It sounds like the person at the other end is standing next to me!

They are extremely comfortable to wear and the colors are neat. The only downside is they're much bigger than the over-the-head sets but for me, that's a minor problem. Now I don't have to strain to hear their voices.

I heartily recommend this product.

Reviews:
I won't lie, I got these for the color pallet, not really taking into account durability or anything like that. I was pleasantly surprised by how durable they were. Good sound quality, they are not noise blocking, which is fine for me. The cable connecting to the left earpiece wore out, whether that is manufacturers fault or mine, I am not sure.
However when I contacted INTONE about this, they were very speedy and polite in their responses, and we were able to resolve the issue very fast. All in all, decent set of headphones, and a good company behind them as well.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I've had these headphones for about 4 months now, and so far they've been decent at best. The audio jack was a bit covered in excess plastic which I had to cut off in order to plug in properly. I had discomfort from wearing them probably 2 to 3 hours into listening through them, but I'm not too sure if that's because of its design or if it's because my head is kinda big. The multifunction button and mic work fine. I think the internal wiring has started to break because if the jack gets bent a certain way it'll fade out, but it's still functioning alright. For the price, they're pretty good headphones. I'd recommend these for children or people with maybe a slightly smaller head on a budget for headphones.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: ****amending this review after a year of owning these headphones, the microphone no longer works at all and whenever I try to use them with my phone they make my audio go berzerk. I didn't associate it with the headphones right away until I started using my regular earbuds again and the issue went away. These are ok temp fashion headphones for the money, but don't expect lasting quality.**** Things I like about these headphones: color, style, nylon covered cable, and price. Things I don't like: if you're using them as a headset, which you can because there is a microphone, you can't monitor your audio going out through the mic. So it's like talking into a mic with earplugs in. Second, the cups don't go totally over my ears, so they kinda smash my ears and get painful to wear for long periods of time, especially when I'm wearing my glasses. They are ok for the price and pretty sturdy, but wouldn't call them great.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I'm sure the product would be great for those who are looking for on-the-ear headphones at a bargain price or potentially for those with tiny ears looking for over-the-ear headphones.

What I wanted was over-the-ear headphones that could accommodate my average ears as well as the piercings that I have at a manageable price for a college student, and these were not them.

Sound quality is good, given the price, but the fact that I cannot have them directly over my ears severely impacts this. The single, reinforced-line out is great, but quality of sound transmitted through microphone is sub-par, and there is a lot of ambient noise transmitted through it.

Color is great, as well as the ability to fold the headphones. Wish they were larger, but they came larger, but they don't. :-/

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
My youngest is dyslexic and needed headphones for school. She loves them. They're soft everywhere. There's enough padding to make wearing them comfortable. They have a crisp sound and has equal volume on both sides. They fold up so that they're easier to fit into her backpack, and sturdy enough that they haven't broken.

She does say that there is a lot of pressure on her ears, because they squeeze. Having grown up with ear buds, she's not used to having something over her ears instead of in them. They are comfortable enough that she wears them to do homework, play games or watch videos.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
Super cute headphones, I love the bright color. They fit on my head well, and don't hurt after a long period of time. They have a skip button, but no volume button. The skip buttons reacts well to my touch (one tap is pause, double tap is skip to next song). They were okay for the first week, but then the sound started cutting out from one ear to the other. I think one of the wires is loose.

It's really too bad about the sound, because I really like everything else about them.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: These headphones are high quality and for an extremely reasonable price. They are best suited for kids given the size, but can be adjusted to fit an adult as well. The ear pieces may help reduce outside noise, but not necessarily cancel. They do a great job of isolating sound around the ear. The stereo sound allows for a great experience while listening to music, watching movies, or playing games on any hand-held or portable device. I was pleasantly surprised to see the cord was braided strands, which reminds me of a chinese jump rope but minus the stretch. It's certainly better than the usual rubber that wears or degrades quickly.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews: I bought this because a) it's cheap and b) the product reviews seemed great. These headphones are cute a very portable. The downside is that the headband is a little too big for my head even on the smallest setting, and sound quality is quite poor. I listen to music for hours a day while working on projects and I was hoping to replace my old Koss headphones with something newer. These Ailihen headphones will not be replacing the Koss ones. However, it's not totally useless. I'll probably bring it along with me when I travel because it can fold up so small.

Reviews: The headphone is awesome! My daughter love its color and stylish design. The overall sound quality is fantastic, it produces the strong low bass sound. She uses it with her iPad. I can make phone call, track music selection, switch between call and music easily by using the in-line remote control and an integrated microphone. Very comfortable to ware because of genuine leather earmuff and adjustable headband. Highly recommend!

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I wanted to love these. They actually sound decent for the price, and they are quite comfortable. I like to listen to music or audiobooks in headphones while I sleep, and I've spent years looking for headphones with a good cable that won't break over time. This braided cord seemed like a good alternative to the standard, thin, wrapped wires.

I had no issues with them for the first two months, but last week the connection started getting scratchy. Today, I completely lost the channel in the ear opposite the cord. Now it's just one more set of broken headphones to add to the pile.

Product: Ailihen I35 Headphones with Microphone Stereo Lightweight Adjustable...
Reviews:
I bought these with my own money and am not affiliated with he company.

I was in the market for new on-ear headphones after my Skull Candys bit the dust. After doing a lot of research and being very frustrated with the number of purchased and discounted reviews on Amazon, I finally settled on these.

PROS
I used these headphones every day at work and on the train for a good four months. They are relatively comfortable for on-ear headphones, although not as comfortable as the over the ear type. They are also very cute and have decently good sound for the price. Even on high volume, my neighbors couldn't hear the sound, so they form a pretty good seal.

CONS
The cord is very long. Like EXCESSIVELY long. I ended up braiding mine to get it down to a more manageable length, so it wasn't too annoying.
They do start to hurt your ears after 3 or 4 hours of wear, but repositioning that seems to help.
There is very little bass.

The biggest problem that I had was that one day, the hinge on one of the earpieces just snapped. I dont put pressure on it, I'm careful to fold them up and put them in a dedicated compartment in my backpack, and yet they still broke. The pieces are a really thin, cheap plastic, so keep that in mind.

For the price, I can't complain too much, but I do wish they had lasted longer. Oh well.
